name: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes
description: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes is an RPG Maker fangame themed around the talents of Hololive. To prevent the awakening of the Demon Lord, the main character, accompanied by Subaru, Mio, Okayu, and Korone, embarks on a very absurd adventure.

name: Super Wizard
description: Super Wizard is a Roguelike action game in which more than 20 magic skills can be chosen. The different combinations of magic skills will create different battle styles. Besides, the mass amount of artifacts with various spell effects will make the battle unlimited.

name: Catch the Bowling Balls: Challenge Mode Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Didnapper 2
description: Didnapper 2 is a story-focused JRPG adventure featuring lots, lots of DiD (damsel in distress) scenes! Play as the magically-gifted hero Seles and try to avoid capture or escape your bonds, as she tries to uncover the secrets of the world with a party of misfits.

name: Lemon Run
description: Hardest runner ever! Try and complete all 5 game modes that go from easy to impossible. (Legends have it that the creator of the game could only make it to 1500m in endless mode) Good luck!

name: Lingo
description: Lingo is a first person word puzzle game with a large, abstract world to explore. With its epiphany-driven gameplay and impossible geometry, Lingo provides a unique and nonlinear experience.

name: Steps of Doom
description: Experience this debut mini Art project by Souette Studio. Presented in traditional hand-drawn animation and movies, spanning 10 levels of various horror themes with multiple endings. Two witches find themselves trapped in a demonic survival board game which they must complete in order to escape the wrath of angry villagers mob. 10 minutes is all it takes... If you are able to last !

name: Snake
description:
Become a snake charmer by helping S N A K E with his apples.

The classic arcade game Snake arrives in a new way programmed without using any video game engine.

name: BBQ Simulator: The Squad
description: BBQ Simulator lets you experience what barbecue means which that most of the time messy ways. You have to feed your friends with well cooked meats before they pass out from hunger. You can play all the experiences with up to 8 friends in multiplayer mode or single player mode.

name: Stickit
description: Stickit is a brutal first person platforming game about climbing higher and higher to reach your ultimate goal, The Golden Stick. At your disposal is the very simple mechanic of sticking to walls and ceilings, no complex control schemes or wonky physics, so how hard can it be?

name: Chocobo GP
description: Get set for a new racing experience in Chocobo GP, featuring a roster of dozens of Chocobo characters, complete with their own unique abilities and variants. Choose your favorite Chocobo series character, and race through familiar tracks set in the Final Fantasy universe. It won't be easy crossing the finish line first. Find magic stones called Magicites (including Fire, Water, and more) throughout the track and equip them to take out the competition. Engine customization options will be available, as well as local and online multiplayer. Up to 64 players can compete in a bracket-style tournament to determine the racing champion.

name: Cleo: A Pirate's Tale
description: Cleo is a solo-developed, top-down, pixel-art, retro, pirate adventure with a lot of nostalgic flair, humor and a linear story, inspired by the old Zelda games and the classic LucasArts adventure games.

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon
description: Delve with Shovel Knight into the depths of the Pocket Dungeon in an action-packed puzzle adventure mashup like none other! Join your mysterious guide Puzzle Knight as you shovel through scads of foes, procure new equipment, and battle bosses both familiar and new. Explore a tale with endless twists and turns, quest as your favorite heroes, and even challenge a friend for fast-paced head-to-head competition in Shovel Knight Pocket Dungeon!

name: Boxing
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamer Girls: Cyberpunk 2069
description: Date them all, win the girls over and unlock unique unique sex scenes!Gamer Girls: Cyberpunk 2069 is a classic visual novel and casual puzzle game with and beautiful sexy scenes.

name: Tailor Tales: Caine Plus
description: Tailor Tales: Caine Plus adds a longer epilogue for Caine. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Don't Turn Your Back On The City
description: This is a short-ish map, maybe ten minutes? Very linear. Possibly a bit trite. Though difficulty settings are supported, I have a feeling UV may be a little underwhelming for seasoned players. I thought best to err on the side of generosity. I specifically restricted myself to only using Doom II textures, though I did use a track from the Ultimate Midi Pack ("Dread Factory" by MFG38).

name: Adventure Ball 3D Balancer
description: 3D Balancer Ball - every level is different from another, good graphics and optimization, nice physics, more than 13+ obstacles, lot of skins for ball, explore the world, collect diamonds and buy whatever skin you want and lot of surprises.

name: Poliana Cake Crush
description: Poliana Cake Crush is a match-3 puzzle game where you make delicious combinations and conquer all levels!

name: Bunbons
description: Raise bunbons and explore the galaxy. Watch your bunbons eat, play, and make friends, and use your mouse or finger to interact with them. With some patience and care, your bunbons may even become space-worthy!

name: KeepUp Pirates
description: You are a pirate on an island, survive alone or with other players and fight against enemy skeletons. Build a shelter and go collect resources to ensure your survival.

name: The World's Hardest Game 3D 2
description: 2nd game of the 3D version of the The World's Hardest Game you play on flash game sites! 30 different, unique and challenging levels are waiting for in this 3D Platformer! Will you be able to see the last level?

name: Solo ReflectioN!
description: In this truly unique brick breaker game, you'll need to guard both sides of the screen to keep your balls in play. To earn points, you'll need to collect coins from broken bricks and then blow bank bubbles to have a way to exchange your coins for scoreboard points!

name: The Humbling of a Holy Maiden
description: The Tree of Life is dead and withered, and the kingdom's Holy Maiden longs to be disgraced. You have come from another world to teach her what it means to love. Witness the Holy Maiden's transformation as she descends into sweet corruption!

name: Slit Mouthed
description: Slit Mouthed is a first-person horror adventure game based on a Japanese myth. The gameplay focuses on storytelling, stealth and decision making, there are also some puzzles for the player to solve, making gameplay more various.

name: Shootvaders: The Beginning
description: The Space mission center has ordered you to fly into space and find a new planet. New planet will bring a new possibilities to humankind. The flight won't be easy! The universe has many alien groups that want to stop you.

name: Monkey Doomsday
description: Welcome to a world where the entire human population of earth is undergoing a massive de evolution process! The human race has de evolved back into monkeys and are causing an apocalyptic mayhem over the entire earth, and It's only up to you to end this terrorizing madness!

name: Sex Girlfriend Simulator
description: Have you ever thought about being the perfect girlfriend? Now your dreams will come true!

name: Witch Sequencer
description: Witch Sequencer is an adult transformation puzzle game. It tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to complete the protagonist's infernal transformation.

name: Below the Ocean
description: Dive deep "Below the Ocean" in search of legendary treasures while using your oxygen lifeline to swing passed obstacles! Run, Jump, Swing, Bubble-Jump, Bungee, Slingshot, Puzzle-Solve, Platform, Treasure-Hunt, BELOW THE OCEAN!

name: Farathan
description: Third-person Indie RPG. Big, open, Medieval-fantasy - world. With lots of monsters and quests. A game for true explorers and adventurers looking for challenges. Rise back to the top as the emperors lost son Eristan - that has to survive in the dark world of Elion.

name: Shadows of Progakko
description:
Adam Samishi went to live at Progakko, a huge school with the purpose of protecting teenagers from a threat that occurs in the country, however, nobody knows what exactly this threat is.

Note:
This game was originally released on Gamejolt, then re-released on Itch.io a few months later.
At the time the developer was known as SlothOgami/ShinOgami, only later it became Kuraishimi.

name: It Fishes At Night
description:
IT FISHES AT NIGHT is a short, story based retro horror game about fishing. On your way to catch the big fish you've always wanted to snag, you meet a strange fisherman who quickly becomes a problem.

Can you escape?

name: Memory Puzzle: Mystery Mermaids
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing sexy mermaids hidden under viking rune symbols which you have to match.

name: Tails Adventure: Fire of Robollion
description: A platform developed for Game Gear starring Miles "Tails" Prower. The Tails Island has been attacked by the terrible fire robots of Robollion. Explore Tails island and defeat enemies. This hack adds a few new assets, new color palettes and new levels. All of the levels from the original game were redone, from the color palette to the level design.

name: Tailor Tales: Neil Plus
description: Tailor Tales: Neil Plus adds a longer epilogue for Neil. This epilogue is filled with explicit adult content and features the final (10th) CG. You also unlock the ability to skip gold and dress requirements for each chapter.

name: Mood
description: Sin descripción

name: Who is the New Maid?
description: There is a rumor that the new maid is a lesbian. And a slut. You're Stephanie, the oldest of three sisters, and it is your responsibility to make sure the new maid fits in at the manor.

name: Sionan
description: You've been sent to collect logs relating to a facility's mysterious destruction. Guided only by a voice and hounded by a robot, you must uncover what happened to the researchers.

name: The Chronicles of Myrtana: Archolos
description:
The Chronicles Of Myrtana: Archolos is a free, total conversion mod for Gothic II: Gold Edition. It features a completely new open world, improved skills systems, gameplay mechanics and complex story.

Main goal of this project is to honour one the best classic cRPG and take the die-hard fans of the original Gothic trilogy as well as new players on one more adventure in the Kingdom of Myrtana.

name: Luminescent
description: A moderately hard hack of Super Mario World. Luminescent is meant to be a fun challenge for the kaizo enthusiast who seeks to delve into tougher territory, while still being firmly intermediate in nature. It is ASM heavy, and features a plethora of custom stuff while keeping the familiar aesthetics and playability of the original game.

name: My Foxy Girlfriend
description: The legends of Hazushima Island speak of shapeshifting village protectors—the mighty Kitsune. But when a giant corporation rolls into town to destroy the forest, it's up to you to protect these mythical beings from losing their home.

name: Degraman: Act I - Vincent
description: An otome visual novel - play a powerless victim of a terrifying, unfair world. 200+ choices, 50+ endings, 20+ hours of play - and only one way to escape.

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star
description: Hundred Fires is an action, stealth and infiltration game with an exciting story and incredible cinematics. This is a one man infiltration mission, you alone cannot defeat the entire Soviet army, you must use your best skills to hide, sneak away from the enemy and go undetected.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Warrior Priest Career
description: The Warrior Priest of Sigmar is a new career for Victor Saltzpyre. This DLC contains the new playable career complete with a new talent tree, new weapon types, new abilities, a new Warrior Priest of Sigmar skin, and more.

name: Andy's Apple Farm: Christmas Special
description: Celebrate the Holiday Season with Andy the Apple and his Friends!

name: Roof Genocide
description: Could you dare to slash through your way in a space era with our mighty warrior Zila! Ease your mind with our nostalgic athmosphere while fighting against dreadful robots.

name: Alpha Shark
description: Ever wanted to be a great white shark? Now you can! Swim, eat, explore, and more! Lurk the margins of our world alone or with friends in this vast coral reef spanning the ocean floor.

name: They Came From Below
description: They Came From Below is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of skeletons.

name: Connectify
description: Welcome to the Connectify puzzle! The object of the game is to connect dots with the same numbers in a line without crossing other lines.

name: Arcante: Definitive Edition
description: A Fantasy Action RPG. Create your party and head off on an adventure. Playing Turn-Based or Real Time is up to you.

name: Lemon vs. Teddy
description: Become a lemon and destroy the world with sausages before Teddy does it in this combat-focused RPG.

name: Sprocket Wings
description: In this fast-paced 3D racing game, you’ll go wing to wing against a motley band of Gnomelings. After zigzagging through 16 trippy courses, you’ll wonder: Is it a race with a twist or a twisted rave? Either way, expect a potent dose of disorienting visuals and disturbing surprises at every turn.

name: GhostHunter
description: Ghost Hunter is a cartoon style party game. You can play it with your local and online friends. Use your SpiritGun to eliminate ghost and disturb your adversary.

name: Moto Roller
description: Moto Roller is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You ride a fast motorcycle through a city filled with cars or along a narrow highway.

name: Blue Fire: Void Maker
description: Blue Fire: Void Maker is a 3D platforming and level creation game. Let your imagination run wild designing hardcore, epic or silly levels and sharing them with others! The possibilities are endless in this FREE spin-off of the highly-rated action adventure game Blue Fire.

name: Ice Cream Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Wild & Adventure Pinball
description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: VenusBlood Hollow International
description: War hangs like the sword of Damocles over Helvetia, a land ruled by four Dark Lords. In this age of blood and strife, Leonhardt Arknoah, a war hero and leader of the Varganian Empire's secret task force, steps onto the battlefield once more, the flames of ambition burning brightly within him.

name: Void Grimm
description: Void Grimm is a real-time deckbuilding roguelike game. Fight your way through waves of enemy spaceships. Your survival in the fast-paced battles requires quick thinking even at increased adrenaline levels. Gather your crew, optimize your deck and utilize card synergies to master your runs.

name: Wukong
description:
A small and colorful platformer, inspired by the "Journey to the West" novel. Every level contains a new mechanic that will explore new ways to use your skills.
In Wukong you play as the Monkey Key in a quest to retrieve the lost scrolls. Jump, spin, throw your staff, and step on the enemies that will try to put an end to your journey.

name: Cyberfrags '69
description: Move fast and shoot fast in Cyberfrags '69. Double jump, wall-run, and blast your way to victory in intense PvP and Co-Op, or play as Cyber-Frank as he slaughters the Cyber-Nazis invading his home! It's time to get your blood up with some lightning-speed FPS action! Double-jump, wall-run, slide, and shoot your way to victory in PvP, Co-op, and single-player. In CF69, the fastest way to die is to stop moving. So don't.

name: Bitburner
description: Bitburner is a programming-based incremental game. Write scripts in JavaScript to automate gameplay, learn skills, play minigames, solve puzzles, and more in this cyberpunk text-based incremental RPG.

name: The Timeless Child
description:
The Timeless Child is a 2-player puzzle-adventure coop game with first-person view.

Start an exciting and engaging adventure, a tale about family, bonds and secrets. You will explore Wells Manor, an ancient 16th century villa full of history and secrets, living the experience from two different temporal perspectives.
Whether you decide to take on the role of Chris Hunt, a skilled hunter on call, or Emily Wells, a child trapped in the past, you'll need to collaborate with your partner to solve puzzles that require cooperation and logic to be completed.

Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey to the borders of time and space to save Emily from her time captivity?

name: Cat Box Paradox
description: A fast paced retro platform game, you must think fast as you run, jump and swap colour, making your way through 8 floors of challenging and amusing colour changing mayhem.

name: Strip Fighter 5: Chimpocon Edition
description: 22 eccentric fighters battle for supremacy in a mysterious underground fighting competition! Brimming with tongue-in-cheek humor, excess violence, and wanton titillation...re-experience a classic age of gaming with this love filled tribute to hardcore fans of 90's era 2D fighting games!

name: Cave Story's Secret Santa
description: After Balrog recovers the Christmas presents that were stolen by Chaba, the cowardly Mimiga named Santa must sneak into every house and return the missing packages. Be the Mimiga Who Saves Christmas!

name: Egg King
description: Egg King is a platformer game with a twist, you're going to go down by jumping and rolling. Go on a journey across the land and reach the lost crown of the king. Visit different landscapes and raise your ability. Become the new king and make the rich!

name: Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid: 3Days
description:
Produced in 3 days!
The Ultimate Combination of Old maid and Mahjong!

"Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid: 3Days" is a game based on the card game Babanuki. It is an irregular Old Maid where the player's actions are determined by the ability tiles that are replenished each turn, apart from the cards such as Numbers and Jokers.

name: Wrought Flesh
description: Rip out organs and equip them in your own body. Fight biopunk monsters and drugged-up space bandits. You are a Gajeshian Cultist: A near-mythological being built from the bodies of long-dead saints.

name: Packing House
description: Start your own online store! Buy products from wholesalers and list them profitably on the Internet. Increase your shipping capacity and assortment. Ensure timely delivery to customers and that everyone receives the goods they ordered. Beware of negative reviews as they can spoil your reputation!

name: Terminator: Resistance - Annihilation Line
description: Annihilation Line is a new narrative DLC campaign for Terminator: Resistance and picks up mid-way through the main campaign story. The DLC sees Jacob Rivers and a small team of Resistance soldiers led by Kyle Reese heading into the most dangerous territory imaginable...the land beyond the Annihilation Line.

name: Space Invaders Forever: Special Edition
description:
Back again - arcade legend and icon of gaming history! Lighting the fuse for a gaming revolution. Space Invaders is surely one of the most famous video games of all time and was the launching pad for the video gaming revolution. The game mechanics and its design make it a game that encompasses all the very best.

The following games are part of the Space Invader Forever Collection: Special Edition:
- Space Invaders Extreme game
- Space Invaders Gigamax 4 SE game
- Arkanoid vs. Space Invaders game
- Rubber Keychain
- A3 Poster
- Invader Card
- 4 Outdoor Stickers
- Invader Pin
- Note Pad
- Post Card Set
- Mini Art Plate

name: Boxed-In
description: Boxed-In is a small action puzzle game where you trap little enemies.

name: Mr.Bottle and His Dream
description: Mr. Bottle lives in a small wine cellar. Perhaps unwilling to be ordinary, or perhaps his heart longing something, he decides to depart and seek a dream of his own. It's a retro cross-board physics indie game with a single player storyline and a multiplayer racing mode.

name: Perfect Heist 2
description: Perfect Heist 2 is a round-based online game, where robbers try to hide in plain sight while robbing a bank without being noticed by the cop team!

name: Garage: Bad Dream Adventure
description: In this remastered version of Garage: Bad Dream Adventure, almost all images have been retouched, videos have been revised using AI frame interpolation, user-interface and game balance have been improved, and new chapters, subquests and multiple endings have been added.

name: Inglorious Aztecs
description: Inglorious Aztecs is a 2-4 player online multiplayer game centered around fast-paced versus matches with a high fun factor. Mine the terrain with your Pickaxe, block incoming bullets with blocks placement, and most importantly; Be the last player to survive!

name: The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails
description:
Nayuta no Kiseki (Trails of Nayuta) is an action-RPG developed by Nihon Falcom for PlayStation Portable. The game belongs to The Legend of Heroes series of role-playing video games, but is more action-oriented, and is not a mainline entry in the series.

The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails is an English version of the PSP classic "Nayuta no Kiseki (Trails of Nayuta)" and published by NIS America was released for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Windows in North America on September 19, 2023, and in Europe and Oceania on September 22.

name: Mayhem Pantera
description: Medium-sized moldy brick level inside a cave. It runs on the SMP mod (included). The map source is included.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Early Cretaceous Pack
description: Breathe new life into your parks and discover a stunning array of Cretaceous animals with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Early Cretaceous Pack.

name: Suika Game
description: A game where you drop fruits. When two of the same fruit meet, they form a bigger fruit, which can then combine to create an even bigger fruit, until eventually you form a watermelon!

name: Splash Fly Fire
description: Flappy Fly Fire is a game in which you need to control fire. The game ends when the fire touches the dynamite and everything explodes.

name: Futanari Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Complete Classic Jigsaw Puzzles featuring very raunchy depictions of Futanari. All puzzles are Ultra High Resolution and available in multiple sizes, up to 1000 pieces.

name: Mario Kart 64 Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for Mario Kart 64.

name: Yurivania 2: Josette's Quest
description:
Vampire girlfriend houses her community~!

The Midnight Palace's vampire quarter has become overcrowded.

Josette, vampire facilitator, planed a date with her girlfriend, Tibby, tonight.

But the expansion deadline has come and Josette needs to put her community ahead of romance.

Explore the Palace, interact with the monstergirls, gathering building materials, and decide how the new wing looks.

Along the way, maybe find a way to make up to Tibby for the missed date...!

name: For Honor: Season 20 - Frozen Shores
description:
The rise of the waters during the Tempest and the subsequent winter allowed seafaring pirates passage to the frozen shores of Heathmoor. These pirates had no allegiance to any faction – they only cared about treasure. In their pursuit of wealth, they began trading with the people, offering warriors access to new weapons from across the sea.

Take your character through a journey of 100 Tiers of rewards for all heroes! Available during For Honor: Frozen Shores only.

name: Time is Solid Here
description:
A long, yellow hallway. A floating head who talks of monster trucks and places in-between. A painting, three a plenty, each with someone in need of moving on.

Such is the horror puzzle game, Time is Solid Here, recently selected for the Goethe-Institut's Stillstand/Standstill Project Exhibition.

name: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition
description: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition puts you in the middle of the action - use a variety of weapons to battle the terrifying Sharknado. Maim, shoot and explode your way through hordes of hungry flying sharks and other airborne sea creatures in Sharknado VR!

name: After the Fall: Launch Edition
description:
Built from the ground up for VR, After the Fall is the ultimate multiplayer zombie apocalypse! Team up with up to 3 fellow survivors and take on a twisted, hostile world in which all hell has frozen over.

Welcome to ‘The Line’... Decades have passed since the apocalypse turned 1980s Los Angeles into a snow-crested wasteland, overrun by mutated undead. Starting out in an underground camp with up to 32 other player survivors, you take up arms as a new Harvest Runner. Your mission? Venturing out above ground to expand the Line’s reach into the city and fuel mankind’s survival for another day.

• 3 ways to play: Solo, 4-player co-op & the competitive Tundradome
• Explore sub-zero LA in a mission-based campaign
• Slay massive hordes, brutal specials & towering bosses!
• Craft, upgrade & wield dozens of weapons with real-life movements
• Join our ranks as LA expands with maps, modes & threats during Launch Season

name: WWII Tanks: Battlefield
description: Immerse yourself in a world of armored tank battles. Choose from a wide range of famous tanks of the major combatants. Pick the best tank and blast your way across the battlefield. Defeat your enemies with force and strategic decisions! And lead your team on a glorious road to victory!

name: Amethyst Hearth
description:
It's been your family tradition to go to that one farm and buy that one Christmas tree.

This year, some jerk sent her huge robot to buy it.

After a huge argument, you let the robot take the tree and you storm off.

But then, the robot shows up at your doorstep, fighting against his programming to secure the tree just to give it to you.

You talk to the robot, and start to get to know him better.

Where will this lead? Who knows.

But one thing is for certain: your Christmas won't be so lonely this year...

name: Future Tanks Area
description: 3D third-person shooter game. Control a tank using a keyboard and mouse. Go through various maps and destroy bots on your way. Fight with two main bosses on your path to complete the game.

name: Berry
description: Berry is a short orthogonal 3D platformer about a tiny, blue spider. Gain new abilities, weave through projectiles, collect and purchase a variety of items, and combat various bosses in this tiny metroidvania adventure.

name: Hanna in a Choppa 3
description: Take flight in the latest installment of the hugely popular Hanna in a Choppa series of games. Guide Hanna through 10 bonkers levels, each with hidden secrets and achievements. Train your pet elephant Stompy, steal honey from pesky bees, humiliate upgraded OXOBot at his own game, and of course, The Button makes a spectacular return.

name: Mugen Abisu
description: Try to dodge the traps on our endless platform game. Slash the enemies to get more points. The dungeon is getting darker and harder in time so stay sharp!

name: World of Barn
description: World of Bärn is an RPG game where you fight from your village that is under attack you have to do quests to get ahead in the game

name: 2048 Royal Cards
description: 2048 is a classic puzzle with a simple goal; reach 2048. Move your tiles across the grid and merge identical numbers into one. Plan ahead and watch out for new tiles spawning, that may prevent you from joining your numbers.

name: Viy: Retold Story
description: the game in the quest genre is based on the Gogol's story 'Vij'.

name: Hidden Magic Town
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Welcome to Your Immune System
description: Welcome to Your Immune System is an addictive retro arcade-style video game where you defend human cells from invading bacteria. Use all the weapons in your arsenal from macrophages, killer T cells, to cytokines and learn how these work in real life.

name: Deflector: Specimen Zero
description: Deflector: Specimen Zero is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your character with the DNA you find, evolve him further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: MeecheenMe
description: A crazy online third person shooter. Create and import Custom Models & Custom Taunts for everyone to see!

name: Forest Star
description: Help a monkey find a fallen star in this short adventure game! Meet and recruit other animals, find useful items, and discover new abilities. Multiple endings available depending on your choices!

name: Cursed Island
description: Search for secrets, solve puzzles, get ready to survive a series of dangerous nights in this action adventure full of challenges and difficulties. Will you be able to escape from the Cursed island?

name: Palphone-Sama: Curse Call
description: All of the Twitter accounts and Websites in the game exist in reality. Use your Internet browser to gather information and uncover hidden secrets, and get to the bottom of the urban legend surrounding the popular calling and live streaming App "Palphone"!

name: Pet idle
description: Pet Idle is a simulation game where you can take care of various virtual animals! Build and manage your home to be a cozy home for many pets!

name: Pirate Raid: Caribbean Battle
description: Ahoy me hearties! Ready to hoist the mainsail, batten down the hatches and blaze your way across the Caribbean in search of plunder, glory, and hours of pirate fun? Down your grog and grab your cutlass, it’s all hands on deck in this fast-paced pirate simulator that will really float your boat. Race full-sail across the high seas to do battle with simple merchantmen, naval battleships, and fearsome sea monsters, all while filling your coffers with booty to spend on expanding your tropical island hideaway and upgrading your mighty pirateship in preparation for ever fiercer battles and more dastardly buccaneering further into the game!

name: Space KaBaam
description: Sin descripción

name: Captain U
description: Welcome to this new, yet familiar, universe. You are now known as Captain U and you are here to locate the missing princess! Equipped with this universe's legendary weapon, the PowerPad, you will utilize your unique powers to find the princess and save the universe! Adventure through 9 challenging levels and explore some familiar areas with a new twist! Utilize your new founded PowerPad Powers to create or move platforms or defeat enemies. Play on the big screen or the small screen - switch between screens during game play. Try to get the highest score possible!

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Buster
description: Dragon Buster is an action game released by Namco in 1984. Become the hero Clovis, and use your sword and magic and make your way to Dragon Mountain. Battle through demon-infested graveyards and ruins to defeat the mighty Dragon and rescue Princess Celia.

name: Stuck in Time
description: A unique mix of adventure and idle game. Plan and optimise your loops carefully and let the grind happen automatically. Explore this unique world, meet strange characters and escape the loop. A high-quality idle game that elevate the mechanics through an old school pixel-art adventure.

name: Monopoly Plus and Monopoly Madness
description: Monopoly Plus and Monopoly Madness is a bundle of two Monopoly games: Monopoly Plus and Monopoly Madness. Both games are a take on the classic board game Monopoly.

name: Furry Shades of Gay 2: A Shade Gayer - Love Stories Episodes
description: Furry Shades of Gay 2 builds on the first installment of the series to bring you even more love, more puzzles and more hot gay sex! Five new, longer stories with more plot and beautiful art, improved puzzle mechanics, and the hottest sex scenes in the series!

name: Keo
description: Keo is a team-based online multiplayer vehicle combat game set in a sci-fi post-apocalyptic world. Build your loadout to suit your playstyle and balance your team to dominate the battlefield using futuristic remote controlled vehicles!

name: Blasphemous: Wounds of Eventide
description: Join the Penitent One on his final trial in Blasphemous, with the introduction of the game's final DLC chapter, Wounds of Eventide.

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection
description: In celebration of the series’ 35th anniversary, this collection includes Valis: The Fantasm Soldier, Valis II, and Valis III.

name: Dropshipping Simulator
description: Dropshipping Simulator, sell to customers by buying products cheaply! Earn money by making smart cyrptocoin investments! Decorate your house any way you want! and eat a good meal!

name: Witchcraft U
description: Cast spells, mix potions, and break hexes as a first-year magical studies major in this dark academia game of horror, crime, and intrigue!

name: Sunny Cafe
description: In the rainy season, the point when we met. It’s you, letting the dark clouds that around me dissipated and turn into sunny days. Therefore, this café is named after the sunny days that you like. It is called "Sunny Café”.

name: Breakwaters
description: In the oceans depths lies the key to defeating Titans and bringing calm to the waves. Sail the waters to find new islands with resources to build, craft, and survive.

name: Horizon Worlds
description: (Meta) Horizon Worlds is an ever-expanding VR world to explore, play and create. Defy distance, discover extraordinary experiences and be inspired by others.

name: After the Fall
description:
From the creators of the hit VR shooter Arizona Sunshine comes an epic multiplayer VR action FPS with seamless, co-operative gameplay at its core that pits up to four players against a vast, hostile VR world in a raging fight for survival.

Set in the ice-covered ruins of LA nearly 20 years after the apocalypse, After the Fall combines a living, breathing VR world shared with players from all over the world, a cinematic and atmospheric campaign, action-packed solo and multiplayer gameplay, and endgame built from the ground up for VR.

name: Transiruby
description: Explore the mysteries of an unknown land! Transiruby is a metroidvania game where you explore the world as a cyborg protagonist named Siruby. Slash and shoot your way to reveal its hidden secrets!

name: Wytchwood
description: Wytchwood is a crafting adventure game set in a land of gothic fables and fairytales. As the old witch of the woods, explore a strange countryside, collect magic ingredients, brew sorcerous spells, and pass judgement upon a capricious cast of characters.

name: GTFO
description: GTFO is a 4 player action/horror cooperative game for those looking for a real challenge. Players get to play as a team of scavengers, forced to explore and extract valuable artifacts from a vast underground complex that has been overrun by horrifying monsters. Gather weapons, tools and resources to help you survive - and work to unearth the answers about your past and how to escape.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Soba Mask Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Memory Puzzle: Hentai Angels
description: Train your brain with this memory game, featuring angelic rune symbols and reveal sexy hentai angels as you clear the board.

name: Goodbyes
description:
Alex hasn‘t seen her best friend Naomi in weeks until she suddenly gets a text message inviting her over. Naomi‘s moving. Tomorrow. And this will be Alex' last chance to see her.

But there‘s still so much left unsaid…

name: LEGO Duplo Marvel
description: Join Spidey, Captain America, and other MARVEL heroes for exciting adventures and pretend-play fun.

name: Gol Show
description: Gol Show is an arcade soccer game based on the Brazilian game show that ran throughout the years, in which you can relive the experience of hitting the famous penalty kick goal right on your phone.

name: Looking for Aliens: Collector's Edition
description:
Aliens are among us! Can you find traces of them on Earth, the moon, and the edges of the galaxy? Find all the clues to prove the existence of alien civilizations and discover how making fried eggs can end up in a monster attack!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
• Blast-off with five exciting bonus levels!
• Explore the galaxy with a downloadable soundtrack and wallpapers!
• Tons of hidden cards to collect!

name: Die-Rise
description: Sin descripción

name: My Crush, My Bully
description: My Bully, My Crush is a short kinetic visual novel with yuri romance as its theme. It is around 40 minutes long.

name: Red Ball Super Run
description:
Red Alert!
The evil square minions are back and they wreak havoc everywhere.

name: Violet and the Lost Colors
description: Violet and the Lost Colors is a turn-based RPG Maker adventure game where you get to wander the depth of the forest as a witch to gather all the seven colors the princess has lost. It is developed from a simple thought of a strange fairy tale, where the protagonist has always been familiar with magic yet discovered something stranger than magic.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season One
description: Prepare to rise on a new front – Vanguard heats up in the Pacific with a new Battle Pass and new weapons, Operators, maps, and more. Plus, all Vanguard owners get 24 hours of exclusive access to Call of Duty: Warzone Pacific’s new map, Caldera.

name: Giant Mario Bros.
description:
This hack will make Mario and Luigi huge, twice their size.

The levels remain basically the same, but some changes have been made to accommodate the resizing of the player.

name: Christmas Mansion
description: Elf is back! Complete his quests and restore Winterland. Blast through the hundreds of puzzle levels and have a fantastic Christmas holiday again! Hurry up! Winter has tons of fun in stock for you.

name: Death Code
description: Death Code is a battle royale genre. It tells the story of Lin Mohuai, a female protagonist with amnesia, who wakes up to find herself involved in an eight-person battle royale game. Everyone is given a code, and the way to win is to kill the player whose number is plus one.

name: Unidentified
description: The government has been attacked by unidentified creatures, and you, as a mercenary, was hired by the government to clear all the threat. An FPS game which you can fight with those cunning creatures regardless of the weather, day and night change. Earn more and more reward to buy better weapons!

name: Millikan's Reach
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder by Moonlight 2: Crimson Night
description: Strange murders have shaken the city, the work of a twisted killer who only comes out at night and leaves his victims drained of blood. Help Detective Elliot in this thrilling Match3 Crime Story to solve the mysterious case.

name: Re: Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 7 Present Mic
description: Play as Present Mic in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Present Mic's costume.

name: Sotano
description: Sotano is a first person 3d escape room puzzle adventure. Explore areas, collect items and take in your surroundings. You will need all of your puzzle solving skills to put together a plan to make your way through the house, solving riddles and through the many rooms to escape the house of Sotano.

name: SlapBR
description: SlapBR is a simplistic, horror battle royale. You can compete with friends, create and join rooms, and become terrified as you hide-slap-block your way to victory.

name: Grub Gauntlet
description: Grub Gauntlet is a playful physics-based puzzle game. Use bombs, portals, gravity wells, and more to make your way around walls, past spikes, through gates all to find your missing lunch!

name: Maia
description:
Ruby video calls her girlfriend Maia. They haven't talked in awhile.
A short kinetic novel that contains: 1000 words, 1 CG and 1 'cute' girlfriend.

name: Gorilla Online!
description:
Real time online survival games with friends.

When the game starts, one "survivor" is chosen from among the players, and the "gorilla" is the "human".
The "gorilla" wins by capturing the "survivor".
The gorilla wins by catching the survivor, and the survivor wins by running away from the gorilla until the end of the game.

The gorilla must use teamwork and a variety of skills acquired by eating bananas to hunt down the survivor.

Survivors can only run away, but they can use radar to pinpoint the gorilla's location. If you can escape, you'll get a lot of coins and G-stones!

In addition, if the "Survivor" collects all of the "Gorilla Treasures" that exist on the stage, he will be able to collect ....?

name: Mr.Addon in Sulpicius Gallus M
description: Action platform game themed around a cosmic renegade who battles aliens, cyborgs and others.

name: Transient: Extended Edition
description: From the creators of Conarium and the Darkness Within series, comes Transient, a Lovecraftian Cyberpunk thriller.

name: Looking for Aliens
description: Aliens are among us! Can you find traces of them on Earth, the moon, and the edges of the galaxy? Find all the clues to prove the existence of alien civilizations and discover how making fried eggs can end up in a monster attack!

name: Apartment
description:
When all this began, I left my home and most of my belongings behind.
My apartment, recreated from memory.

name: Lost Alone EP.1: Little Sister
description: Growing up with his paternal grandmother after his father was arrested for murdering his mother, George emerges from the spiral of alcohol addiction by meeting his fiancée Hanna. But his childhood traumas will soon return to haunt him, pushing him into the abyss of despair.

name: Sam & Max: Beyond Time and Space
description: The Freelance Police are back on the crime beat in a newly remastered version of their second episodic season. Zombies will dance. Mariachis will sing. A giant battle robot will trash the streets. And when their friends’ lives are at stake, Sam & Max will risk their very souls to set things right.

name: Kiteboarding Pro
description: Race against the clock in time trials, beat that ultimate high score in freestyle or go BIG with massive jumps in freeride mode. From wakestyle to oldschool to kiteloops to wave riding - in Kiteboarding Pro the sky isn't the limit.

name: Monster Rancher 2 DX
description: Welcome to the magical world of Monster Rancher! The beloved series makes its triumphant return with Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX, bringing together the wildly popular simulation games – Monster Rancher and Monster Rancher 2 – all in one amazing collection. Raise your own monsters and train them to compete against other eccentric creatures in combat and tournaments. With hundreds of different monster types, each with their own skills and abilities, every Rancher will be able to raise and train a monster that's a perfect fit for their personality and play style. Returning fans and newcomers alike can enjoy the timeless monster training and battling experience in Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX!

name: Monster Rancher 1 DX
description:
Monster Rancher 1 DX is an updated version of Monster Rancher, featuring additional save slots, Freeze slots, Monster Hall of Fame slots, memos, rankings, and a high-speed mode.

It was released together with Monster Rancher 2 DX in the Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX bundle.

name: Super Nanaru
description:
Super Nanaru is a cute and pixel art concept.
A hardcore side-scrolling jumping platformer game.
Test the limits of the player
Obtain and use skins with various abilities
Defeat all bosses with strong power
Bring back all the bread!

name: The City Must Grow
description: A new city will be established on a flat plain and its administration has been given to you. In order to keep the administration in your hands, the city needs to develop continuously.

name: Monopoly and Monopoly Madness
description: Monopoly and Monopoly Madness is a bundle of two Monopoly games: Monopoly for Nintendo Switch and Monopoly Madness. Both games are a take on the classic board game Monopoly.

name: Monopoly Madness
description: Would you like to become the new Mr. Monopoly? It’s your lucky day! Our favorite Real-Estate Mogul is going on a well-earned vacation and he’s looking for a temporary stand-in. The method of selection? A race for fame and fortune. This time the rules have slightly changed. Monopoly Madness brings the Monopoly experience into the arena for the first time ever. Roam the chaotic streets of Monopoly City, collect resources, buy and upgrade properties, mess with your opponents, and avoid their tricks to win the race for riches. This is madness!

name: Halo Infinite: Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX
description: Welcome to the magical world of Monster Rancher! The beloved series makes its triumphant return with Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX, bringing together the wildly popular simulation games – Monster Rancher and Monster Rancher 2 – all in one amazing collection. Raise your own monsters and train them to compete against other eccentric creatures in combat and tournaments. With hundreds of different monster types, each with their own skills and abilities, every Rancher will be able to raise and train a monster that's a perfect fit for their personality and play style. Returning fans and newcomers alike can enjoy the timeless monster training and battling experience in Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX!

name: Live Empire 2
description: This is a simulation game.

name: Stay Safe 2020
description: You’ve been stuck in quarantine lockdown for months now, but a phone call from a desperate, old woman forces you to risk your life to find her! Can you locate her in time!?

name: Atari Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Atari Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Asteroids Deluxe
- Canyon Bomber
- Centipede
- Crystal Castles
- Liberator
- Lunar Lander
- Millipede
- Missile Command
- Night Driver
- Pong
- Skydiver
- Super Breakout
- Warlords

name: Gaelco Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Gaelco Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Alligator Hunt
- Biomechanical Toy
- Glass
- Snow Board Championship
- Thunder Hoop
- World Rally

name: Data East Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Data East Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Bad Dudes Vs Dragon Ninja (released as Bad Dudes in North America)
- Breakthru
- Burger Time
- Chain Reaction (released as Magical Drop Plus 1! in Japan)
- Dark Seal (released as Gate of Doom in North America)
- Darwin 4078
- Lock 'n' Chase
- Sly Spy (released as Sly Spy: Secret Agent in Europe)
- TumblePop
- Wizard Fire (released as Dark Seal II in Japan)

name: Technōs Arcade I
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Technos Arcade I collection includes the following titles:

- The Combatribes
- Block Out
- Battle Lane Vol. 5
- Double Dragon II: The Revenge
- Double Dragon III: The Rosetta Stone
- Mania Challenge
- Minky Monkey
- Mysterious Stones: Dr John's Adventure

name: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 1
description:
The Bitmap Brothers Collection 1 cartridge brings 5 classic games from the British "rock star" developers to the Evercade, including:
- The Chaos Engine (aka "Soldiers of Fortune" in North America)
- Xenon 2: Megablast
- Speedball
- Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe
- Speedball 2100

name: Intellivision Collection 1
description:
The Intellivision Collection 1 cartridge brings 12 classic Intellivision games to the Evercade! Including Astrosmash, Night Stalker, Frog Bog and more!

Includes:
- Astrosmash
- Buzz Bombers
- Frog Bog
- Night Stalker
- Thunder Castle
- Thin Ice
- Snafu
- Shark! Shark!
- Slap Shot: Super Pro Hockey
- Pinball
- Princess Quest
- Word Rockets

NOTE: Only Word Rockets of The Electric Company Word Fun appears in this collection.

name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Alex Outfit Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: May I Open My Eyes to the Night!?
description: This app will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own adventure stories. You’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

name: Rapsodie
description:
RAPSODIE is a strategic card game that allows you to create your own rap music label with a deck based on your favorite artists.

Sign your favorite artists, discover the talents of tomorrow, face off against other players in very short and wild duels !

name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: Complete Edition
description: This bundle includes "Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn", "Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward", "Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood", "Final Fantasy XIV: Shadowbringers" and "Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker".

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Among the Zombies
description: Among the Zombies - you have to play as a survivor in a city filled with zombies.

name: Welcome to My Cave
description: Can you successfully manage a modern caveman tribe for 10 years? It’s time to prove yourself! Here’s your chance to lead a new caveman tribe and go even further in Welcome to My Cave, a tribe simulation game blending the conveniences of modern life with the Stone Age!

name: Liminal Dreams
description:
A game about exploring strange and bizarre worlds.

You appear in a room of an empty bunker with no memories at all. However, you find a diary with some strange notes.

You explore and find a weird TV, you touch it and...

Suddenly, you got teleported to bizarre worlds where you meet strange characters.

Will you help them? How are you gonna escape this place? And what is this place anyways?

So many questions...

You keep exploring seeking the truth of all this madness.

name: Luigi and the Christmas Quest
description: A Christmas themed Super Mario Bros. mod

name: My Dream is to Be a Model, Not a Maid!
description: Sin descripción

name: Morels: Homestead
description: In this sandbox VR adventure you'll start with a blank canvas of empty land. Explore levels from many environments and find hundreds of unique items to keep for yourself or trade to grow your homestead into whatever you wish. Grow and harvest crops, hunt for the elusive Morel mushroom, and find rarities to give you valuable commodities for trade. Use your metal detector and trusty shovel to find and secure many different treasures. Let out your inner nature enthusiast and photograph beautiful and sometimes rare animals. The path you take is yours to choose. Every homestead will be unique. What will you create?

name: HoGuru Presents: The House With Too Many Zombies In It
description: HOGuru Presents: The House With Too Many Zombies In It is a new action game from the writer of hit horror film COME TRUE! Set during a zombie apocalypse, it tells the story of Crash Bromwell, who has been chosen by god to save the world - unfortunately, he was not also told HOW to do that.

name: Exit 2
description: EXIT 2 Is an short horror game in which you have to collect items without getting cought by the creatures.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Mississippi Acres Preserve
description: From its stunning landscapes to its characteristic wildlife, Mississippi Acres Preserve holds a special place in the hearts of hunters. Now, after devastating flooding, warden Immi Davis needs your help to get the community back on their feet – and figure out what’s been going bump in the night.

name: Five Nights at Ethans
description: A Five Nights at Freddy's fangame.

name: Throne and Crown
description: Critically acclaimed music sound track Rares Bosses Statistics Leveling secret trainer Cut Scene adventure Puzzle Nature calming Choice

name: Stopocop
description: STOPOCOP - Top Down game where the player runs around the level and blocks with a shield, must reflect enemy bullets and direct them in the direction where the enemies are in order to destroy them, but without touching civilians.

name: Love with Furry
description: Love with Furry - exciting game consisting of a series of exciting Mini-novels with furry girls. Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: 18Korea
description: 18Korea is an online multiplayer game for 2 to 5 players motivated by the beloved board game series '18xx'. In the 19~20 century Korean Peninsula, Make the best profit by running railroad companies and trading stocks.

name: EverQuest: Terror of Luclin
description: EverQuest: Terror of Luclin is the twenty-eighth expansion pack to EverQuest. The story revolves around the return to the moon of Luclin, the setting of the third expansion, EverQuest: The Shadows of Luclin from 2001. A powerful force known as the Akheva led by High Priestess Aten Ha Ra emerge in an attempt to re-stablish their empire across the entirety of Luclin while the vampire lord Mayong Mistmoore also serves as a primary antagonist. Players join with a resistance of Akhevian rebels to oppose Aten's plans for domination. The expansion features 7 new zones as well as an increased level cap of 120, as well as new abilities, spells, and alternate advancements.

name: Labyrinth of death
description: Labyrinth of death - You are a brave knight who wanted to perform feats, but failure - you were caught and thrown into the labyrinth of death! Solve clever combinations of levers and buttons in this adventure game and dodge dangerous enemies to reach the exit of the eerie maze and become a hero!

name: Bossa Presents
description: Play prototypes created at Bossa's game jams and help decide which ideas should go into production, becoming real games launched on Steam – with your help and feedback!

name: Dungeon Death
description: Take on the role of one of the king's defenders! And go to the "Deadly Dungeon" filled with various monsters and bosses! Collect various artifacts and purchase items from a mysterious merchant!

name: Mega Zombie Explosion
description: Mega Zombie Explosion is Zombie killing game where you need to survive the Zombie Waves there is lot of Zombies to kill and you need talent to do it. But there is a help many different weapons to kill the zombies and Cool Background Rock Music.

name: SGS Operation Hawaii
description: On December 7th, 1941, the Empire of Japan struck a surprise blow against unsuspecting American forces at Pearl Harbor, Hawaï. In the ensuing confusion and panic, the USA feared a Japanese invasion of Oahu island, but it fortunately did not materialize. But what would have happened if it had?

name: Repit
description: Madness is the repetition of the same action over and over again, in the hope of a change. The challenge that Repit throws at your nerves is not everyone is ready to accept and only a few will be able to reach the end

name: Escape Logan Estate
description: A visit to the Logan Estate leaves a family in pieces. Play as three different family members to explore and solve puzzles to reveal the mystery surrounding the estate.

name: Princess Sera Adventures
description: Princess Sera adventures - In this platformer, you take on the role of a naughty, sweet tooth princess. Her passion for sweets is so great that she escapes from the palace just to collect as much ice cream and peanut butter as possible. But be careful!

name: Restaurant Solitaire Delicious Lunch
description: Cook a delicious lunch and enjoy it! 200 levels with a romantic lunch theme!

name: Unstrong: Space Calamity
description: A long time ago, the star people of the Sun City Pyrmia made sure that nothing would go wrong with the sun. But then they disappeared, and whatever happened remains a mystery. Many centuries later, a star-shaped world held together by chains was torn apart by a big explosion, its debris sent drifting through space. One of the inhabitants of this destroyed world, Glasses Unstrong, plans to put the old world back together with the help of her new friend, Flounder the star child. It's not gonna be easy, but mad scientists like Glasses always find a way to get what they want! Unstrong: Space Calamity is a 3d platformer all about planets, weird gravity and the secrets of outer space. Explore or follow the main storyline -- it's all up to you!

name: Godfall: Challenger Edition
description: Instantly unleash Godfall’s power! Godfall Challenger Edition immediately unlocks a maximum level Valorplate, spoils you with skill points, and equips you with a spread of deadly weapons. Challenge all three end-game modes Lightbringer, Dreamstones, and the Ascended Tower of Trials. Vanquish your enemies and be rewarded with loot worthy of a true Valorian. Loot and slash in up to 3-player matchmade co-op to show your skill, perfect your build, and smash your enemies.

name: Knockout City: Season 4 - Alien Invaders
description: Take me to your crew leader! Reports are coming in all over the city. UFO sightings in the skies. Increased military presence on the ground. Smoke rising from Overland Farms. Aliens are invading Knockout City!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: New Edition
description: Game based on the television quiz show.

name: Castle of Shikigami 2
description: Castle of Shikigami 2 is the second installment of the dramatic shooter that gained popularity in the arcades, Castle of Shikigami. Players choose one of seven (+1?) characters, each with different unique abilities, and use their shots, special Shikigami attack, and bombs to destroy the enemy. The unique backgrounds of each character are intricately intertwined, creating an interesting storyline for the shooter.

name: SpellForce III: Reforced
description: SpellForce III Reforced is a unique mix of an epic RPG storyline blended with accessible real-time strategy elements, designed to offer a riveting console experience to fans and newcomers alike.

name: Destiny 2: Bungie 30th Anniversary Pack
description: The 30th Anniversary Pack includes a new Dungeon, Gjallarhorn Exotic Rocket Launcher, new weapons, armor, and much more.

name: Polygon Hunter
description: Eddie is a student that falls asleep at Geometry Classroom and faces all those Polygons the teacher is drawing in the whiteboard in their dreams, to do this he has an energy weapon with unlimited ammo and the support of pickups with various effects and weapons. Defeat wave after wave and pass across levels based on countries of the world.

name: SnowRunner: Season 6 - Haul & Hustle
description: Haul & Hustle is the sixth content expansion pack for SnowRunner.

name: Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator
description: Buy, sell, and trade organs in a strange and evolving universe. Dive into the quivering innards of alien capitalism in the sci-fi body horror market tycoon game you didn't know you needed.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker
description: Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker is the fourth expansion pack to Final Fantasy XIV Online. The expansion takes the story to the "finale" of the Hydaelyn–Zodiark arc. In addition to adding new areas, the expansion pack increases the level cap to 90 and debuts two new character classes, Sage and Reaper.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III
Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: White Shadows
description:
White Shadows is a modern fable about escaping a dark, weird and violent world.
A long time has passed since The Great War. Humanity is half human, half animal. What remains of civilization lives in The White City, a vast network of towers rising high into a dark sky.

To protect against a deadly pandemic, those who can afford it try to keep themselves alive - by covering their skin in bright white light. Follow Ravengirl as she is trying to escape this huge city, its deadly traps and weird trials. To set herself free, Ravengirl needs to find her way into the brightest highs and the darkest depths of the city, to a mythical place called Tin Town, where the last free people live.​

name: Wolfstride
description: Winning the Ultimate Mech Tournament takes tactical skills to defeat opponents in epic GIANT MECH BATTLES and strategic savvy to repair and upgrade your Mech with the shiniest engines the world has seen. But you gotta pay up! Hit the streets to take any jobs the mysterious locals have to offer.

name: Heavenly Bodies
description: Wrangle the hands and arms of a 1970s space cosmonaut and push, pull and twist your way through an increasingly precarious range of physically-simulated stellar scenarios, where without gravity, nothing is still, nothing is secure, and nothing is simple.

name: Thunder Tier One
description: Thunder Tier One is a top-down tactical shooter that let's you play as tier one operator across various scenarios located all around the globe. Set in late 80s/early 90s it allows you to combine your leadership and tactical skills and contemporary equipment into an efficient war machine. Create your own customized Tier One avatar and jump into action.

name: Rompechanchitos
description: Rompechanchitos (lit. "piggy bank breaker") is an interactive guide about the current pension system in Chile (as of 2021) and its consequences.

name: Paper Mario: Master Quest + Jr.
description:
Paper Mario: Master Quest is a mod made for “Paper Mario” on the N64. It revamps old content and adds plenty of new as well. Often considered “The Dark Souls of Paper Mario”, the mod is incredibly difficult. It was designed with elite challenge runners in mind, and unless you have extensive knowledge of Paper Mario, you may struggle with much of the content.

For those players there is Paper Mario: Master Quest Jr. which has all of the content the original has, with a much more reasonable difficulty curve. If you want to stream the mod, starting with Jr. is recommended.

name: Bugs make fine snacks
description: Bugs make fine snacks is a hand-drawn endless runner game with watercolour illustrations and cool music. Help our little short-sighted owl to fly in the night forest and look for yummy bug snacks. Be careful - don't touch the thorns.

name: Pac-Man Community
description:
Pac-Man Community is a Facebook Pac-Man game developed by Genvid and published by Facebook Gaming in collaboration with Bandai Namco Entertainment, released in 2021.

Pac-Man Community lets players create and play mazes; the original Pac-Man arcade game is also included. On January 5, 2023, the game was announced to shut down on February 4, 2023.

name: Spiritfarer: Jackie & Daria Update
description: The Jackie & Daria Update adds two new characters, Jackie & Daria, as well as a brand new island to the game.

name: My Girlfriend is a Cat Girl?!
description:
In a quiet Japanese town lies a magical place resplendent with nature, and hidden among the town's human residents are people you never could have imagined were real…

When you're suddenly inflicted with a curse that seems impossible to lift, you find yourself thrown into a world of cat girls and wolf people straight out of a fairy tale. Your only hope of breaking the curse is to work alongside the cat girls in a little-known cafe, struggling to keep their hopes and dreams alive while seeking out the remedy for your magical affliction.

Despite the dire circumstances, working with these cute maids isn't all that bad…

name: Mondrian Squares
description: Mondrian Squares is a colourful, abstract puzzle game with random, procedurally generated levels so you never play the same game twice. Progressive difficulty with no upper limit ensures that you will always have a new challenge to face.

name: The Savior From Above
description: A sidescrolling 3D adventure shortgame combining multiple genres and featuring various action and puzzle sequences. Its artistic approach is supported by powerful visuals, intense atmosphere and a unique game narrative on the boundaries of science-fiction and fantasy.

name: Doodle Art: Drawing Games
description: Come and create magic out of your drawings with Doodle Art: Drawing Games!

name: Super Clown: Lost Diamonds
description: Super Clown is Back! Fight against enemy Golem and his evil army and try find hidden red diamonds

name: Karl's Kooky Warehouse
description: A madcap, arcade-style, platforming challenge! Can you best the evils of the warehouse and defeat the C.E.O.?

name: Valkyrie Profile Niffynee
description: Embark on the heroine's adventure. , feeling the fetters between the heroine and her partner, through the vast and magical land of Midgard, the pursuit of their own life and value change story.

name: TouHou Music Recording
description: Another incident hit Gensokyo,in totally SILENCE. This time, Hieda no Akyuu- the girl buried in Gensokyo Chronicles, now was pulled up to fix the history on her own! "TouHou Music Recording" is dedicated to all Touhou Music lovers. Be prepared to start a bizarre journey with Akuu right now.

name: Shadow Tactics: Anniversary Bundle
description:
This bundle celebrates the 5th anniversary of the critically acclaimed game & contains the full Shadow Tactics experience
- The original game Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
- The standalone expansion Aiko's Choice
- The complete set of DLC for both games

name: Hellcoming
description: Hellcoming is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players, who need to clean large areas from hellish abomination with the help of special tools.

name: Coffee Break Mazes
description: Do you remember when our computers came preloaded with those very simple games, minesweeper, solitaire... That was nice, and I miss small, pleasant little digital diversions to click on absentmindedly during a break.

name: The Matrix: Awakens - An Unreal Engine 5 Experience
description: The Matrix: Awakens morphs from breathtakingly realistic cinematic to fast-paced third-person shooter experience, complete with action-packed car chase sequence, and also provides a rich, vastly detailed open world to explore, set within the universe of 'The Matrix'.

name: Roskis: A Boozy Beginning
description: Explore the planet Roskis, meet hippie robots and corporate dinosaurs, find your runaway animals, battle against a pineapple pizza, and save the planet from... OH NO!

name: Panty&Demons
description:
According to Japanese folklore, if you won't destroy the thing that have seen service, it will come to life and turn into yokai. It's called Tsukumogami - "spirit of the old tool".
One of such long forgotten yokai breaks free, leaded by the appetite for revenge to the descendants of thouse who sealed him, starving for women Yin energy.
Will and ordinary schoolboy be able to save all his friends?

Panty & Demons is a match-3 style puzzle game with a visual novel style of presentation and a little sprinkle of RPG elements.

name: Celebrating Pizza
description: This pizza puzzle game features a few of the most beloved pizza toppings from all over the world and challenges you to slice based on the type of pizza ordered. But keep a close eye on the requested toppings and number of slices—the more accurate the order, the more stars you earn!

name: beVaiR
description: beVaiR is a unique combination of story and immersive VR strategy game. Become a neurohacker and modify the living network through strategic actions: collect energy, convert it according to your demands and shoot it at the nodes. Help your faction dominate!

name: This Is the President
description: This Is the President is a political thriller. You are the newly elected leader with a shady background. It is up to you to abuse the position of the most powerful man in the world to escape justice for past crimes - even if that pitches the country into utter chaos.

name: Mr.DomusMundi
description: Prince Mundi solves only global issues on the scale of the kingdom.

name: Love 3
description: LOVE 3 is a precision platformer where you control fiveEight, a lone survivor searching for others in a mechanical, apocalyptic world. Face challenging obstacles, discover hidden secrets, and try to find hope within the hopeless as you overcome each new danger.

name: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Aiko’s Choice
description: Aiko's Choice is a brand-new standalone addon to the beloved stealth tactics game Shadow Tactics. Set in Japan around the Edo period, you take control of kunoichi adept Aiko and her deadly assassin friends to hunt down the ghosts of her past.

name: Slam Dunk
description: Slam Dunk is a real-time 3v3 Basketball game adapted from the Japanese anime with the same name. Meet the original characters, watch the original story and those classic scenes. You will be able to use those familiar skills like “Hua Hua Defense”, “Akagi Dunk” and “Lightning Fast”; while experiencing the strength of each high-school basketball team. Let’s ignite your passion for basketball and feel those touching moment through the competitions. Enjoy creating and developing your very own playing technique!

name: Word Tower Puzzle
description:
Word Tower Premium Puzzle is the best addictive word search game that you can play offline and without any annoying ads,
this new word search game is a great combination of classic word game, word quest game and word quiz game that's challenging your mind and makes you learn new vocabulary.

name: Shopping Sort
description:
Are you a shopping beast? Are you ready to exploit the best deals and make the most of your cash? Then this is the game for you!

In Shopping Sort you play as a shopping professional, always on the lookout for the newest promotions. Get ready and train to buy things on the cheap!

name: Violent Rumble
description: Community mapping event organized at 4chan's retro videogame board: 11 large levels including a start map and a secret map, following a variety of styles and texture themes. They run on a custom mod that combines enemies, weapons, items and assets from both official mission packs, Quoth, Arcane Dimensions, RMQ and Progs_dump. As such, it comes with many new models, sounds as well as skyboxes and custom music tracks.

name: Heroes TD
description:
Are you looking for a tower defense game with unique and creative tactical gameplay, an esports game that will lead you to endless battles in the universe of Heroes?

Welcome to HeroesTD - TOP Free-to-Play Thu Thanh Esports Game with a large number of players, receiving many positive reviews from players, streamers and KOLs, is expected to become a great player. A new phenomenon in the era of Thu Thanh Esports series.

name: Growling In My Demise
description:
Mekra D. needs to get away.
This is a very short, nice little pocket game.

name: Mario Eisouoku: Illusionary Blossom of Cranium Prayer
description: What happens when five fans of Super Mario World and Touhou Project come together to make a hack? Super Mario World with Touhou elements mixed in, of course! Aside from the usual platforming and exploration of strange lands, Mario now has to focus and dodge bullets fired by familiar foes as the Mushroom Kingdom gets dragged into a new incident.

name: Racing: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Chu
description:
A super-super-super-super easy control action game with just one tap on the screen!
Anyone can play!? However, it's super hard!?? Feel great if it works well!!!
Let's enjoy the simple and stylish game in your free time!!

name: Where It All Began
description: Where it all began is set in the same universe as Summer's Gone. Both games are deeply connected and are the first two out of five planned games in total.

name: The Way Home
description: The Way Home is a rogue-like dungeon crawler game. Defeat enemies, collect resources, and construct buildings. You can enjoy dynamic battles with the cuteness of pixel art.

name: Magic Walk
description: An amazing magical world is waiting for you in the game Magic Walk. Mysterious elves and dangerous beasts lurk in the local groves. This game is suitable for children and adults. Try the fairy tale to taste and feel the magic.

name: Gunner Deadly Expedition
description: Gunner Deadly expedition - In this shoot em up + platformer hybrid game, you have to fight hordes of your evil clones who are trying to ruin your vacation. Take your rifle and show who's in charge

name: X Virus
description: X virus is a first person shooting game with realistic game style. Players go deep into the epidemic area to fight with infected workers. The game can call airdrop or even missiles for long-range attack.

name: Scriptur
description: Scriptur is a kinetic visual novel featuring original artworks, soundtrack, and characters. You woke up on the train, knowing not how you ended up in it and where it was going. What is the secret behind all this? Will it be possible to reveal it and restore the memories of what happened?

name: Pizza Man
description: Race against time to deliver your pizzas.

name: Choro 2021
description: Choro 2021 is a mobile game released for Android and iOS on 5 December 2021. The game follows a cowboy in a dystopian Venezuela that has to fight malandros, soldiers, zombies and witches, while finding references of the country, such as an empanada, a Toronto or a Riko Malt. In the first released level, the protagonist has to cross Mission Zamora and fight the witch Bruja Maruja. Developed by Venezuelan filmmaker Carl Zitelmann and based in an homonymous novel, Choro 2021 is an action and adventure metroidvania, with a design similar to Contra, Mega Man, Castlevania and Ninja Gaiden.

name: Project Unirah
description: Project Unirah is a third person shooter created by a single developer using Unreal Engine 4. Fight your way through a factory setting, learn what happened and uncover the reason for your existence.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3
description: The island from Chapter 2 has been turned upside down... literally. Step onto the new island and explore every corner of an undiscovered world in Fortnite Chapter 3 Season 1: Flipped.

name: Maldita Castilla EX: Collector's Edition
description:
The tears of a young witch have been turned by a demon into a key that opens up a gateway for the evil in this world. The King Alfonso VI of León has gathered his loyal knights to get to Tolomera del Rey and finish the nightmare using the power of the Witch’s tears. Banish the zombies and demons that entered the Kingdom of Castile with Don Ramiro, the loyal King’s Knight, and his friends. For that, you will use a different range of weapons to defeat your enemies through the cursed lands of Tolomera, in a pure classic arcade action style.

The Cursed Castilla EX: Collector's Edition includes:
- Cursed Castilla physical game for the Nintendo Switch
- Reversible cover
- Full-color game manual
- Complete original soundtrack
- Arcade cut-out with 3D screen
- Revised "Making Of" book
- Keychain
- Sticker

name: Trilogi Keluarga Bahagia Side Story: Sulastri Si Tukang Jamu
description:
Sulastri hasn't paid the tuition fee yet.
However, he did not have enough money to pay, considering that his mother could not sell herbs because of illness.
Because of Mrs. Jamilah's kindness, Sulastri was given an additional 6 months deadline.
Will Sulastri be able to pay off her tuition fees after selling herbs to replace her mother for 6 months?

name: Rock Pit
description: Rock Pit is a fantastic cave platformer. It features lots of baddies, cave exploring, funny cut scenes, hand drawn graphics and a rock soundtrack!

name: Squid Guys
description: Squid Guys is a Third-Person Multiplayer game. You play through several different deadly challenges based on children's games. The game continues until the last player stands.

name: Pokémon Tectonic
description: Explore the Makya region, where old and new collide. Host to dozens of ancient caves and tunnels, Makya was settled anew by the disbanded members of Team Chasm, who 20 years ago sought the power of the Regis. When a strange new group puts those plans back into motion, the people of Makya need a newcomer like yourself to delve deep and find the truth. Can you keep Makya from repeating its past?

name: The Arson Betrayal
description:
The Arson Betrayal is a choice-driven and story-focused action-thriller visual novel. Players are given the opportunity to choose which girls they wish to pursue a relationship with, as they spiral down towards the center of a deadly conspiracy.
As the story goes, you'll discover the girls' different kinks and be given the chance to determine how your relationship with them progresses, romantically or otherwise.
A majority of your choices and conversations with characters throughout the story are remembered and may affect the story as you go forward.

name: Town of Host
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Duper Metroid
description: Super Duper Metroid is an exploration oriented hack of Super Metroid that was originally being created by Daltone and later finished and touched up by Metaquarius. It uses v0.8.1 of Project Base, and also contains a mirror mode and a built-in randomizer!
=7 is a unique and satisfying Dice game! Simply pair two dice to equal seven. Avoid mismatching dice and collect stars and unlock new dice!

name: Equinox
description: The moon has shattered. Plunged into darkness, the world looks to an unlikely hero: a tiny yet tenacious bunny. Defy all odds and reach for the stars in this whimsical 2D platformer.

name: Robo pocket: 3d fighter with rollback
description: A 3d robot fighter with rollback netcode.

name: Alone With You
description: Rei is a high-school student who isn't popular among girls. But suddenly his life changes: two beautiful girls started to pay attention to him. Will he make the right choice or is he doomed to be alone?

name: ChickenZ
description: ChickenZ is an arena shooter where you have to fight in a post-apocalyptic location against crowds of angry zombies that will try to eat you.

name: My Furry Detective
description: My Furry Detective is a comedy detective story about motivation, hard work and dreams. Investigate the crime, spend time with your partner, and who knows, maybe you can get along, or even solve the crime together?

name: Hero Zex
description: In a world with a prophecy where the "Blue Haired Hero" will defeat the Demon Lord, A kingdom is attacked by demons... Just then, "Zex", captured as a prisoner is lucky and escapes. His fate greatly changes from this moment...

name: Maze Art: Pink
description: Maze Art: Pink - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Yellow
description: Maze Art: Yellow - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Orange
description: Maze Art: Orange - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Purple
description: Maze Art: Purple - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Tiny Tank
description: Top-down survive game, with arena style gameplay. Survive wave of incoming enemy tanks.

name: Wall to Wall
description: Wall to Wall is an arcade scoring game.
