name: Ping Pong Pufferfish
description: Aim precisely to get into the glass jar. Ping Pong Puffership is a challenging puzzle game in which you toss a ball until it hits the jar. The fewer balls you use, the more points you get!

name: 0x0 Minimalist
description: Classic computer puzzle game. Push to complete the puzzle, starts easy and gets really hard.

name: Knell of St. Godhrkar
description: In this game, you can watch as 7 protagonists come to a crossroad, facing their own destiny. You will witness their own choices and the blood-splattering consequence they have on one another. There is no way out except to plunge them into the abyss...

name: Waifus Smash
description: Waifus Smash is a sokoban puzzle/adventure game. Control your hero to explore the world, solve the puzzle and prove yourself

name: Mourning Inc.
description: There is a place where it helps to process what we have lost in our life. There is a place where new special guests always arrive and leave. There is a place where it helps to let go of the past and you start to live future. This is Mourning Inc!

name: Lelie Navigation!
description: A turn-based RPG where you play as Lelie, a woman who uses the power of Dowsing to help people find things they've lost. One day however, Lelie's power gets her and her friend into a dangerous situation that they must work together to overcome.

name: Icarus
description: An alien world for the taking. Explore, survive and make your fortune if you dare. Icarus is a multiplayer co-operative survival game with persistent metagame progression.

name: Who is the Criminal
description: Set in school life, “Who is the Criminal” is a text-based adventure game featuring comedian and inference elements. With inquiring suspects and debating with “evildoers”, he gathers pieces of puzzles and reveals what truly happens in every incident.

name: Race on Ice 2020 Pro
description: Race On Ice 2020 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2020 . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.

name: Lights
description: Lights is an endless runner in which you need to dodge various obstacles and earn points.

name: Burning Dead
description:
Survive the terror in Burning Dead.

Escape through forests and mountains full of zombies.

Rescue your daughter and become a hero.

name: Toontown Rewritten: Sellbot Task Force
description: Sellbot Task Force expands Toontown with challenging Sellbot Field Offices and a substantial new taskline

name: Bounceables
description: You gotta keep 'em moving! Stay focused, because they're not going to stop moving anytime soon! Stop the balls from colliding, keep 'em apart for as long as possible. Easy right? Well... put that to the test in Bounceables.

name: Fright Cops
description: Fright Cops is an indie arcade game about cops and food, described by its author as "a portrayal of the police as what they are: a horde of murderous undead."

name: Magurele Mystery
description: A military mission in Romania has gone wrong when a mysterious beast attacks. Beat your fear and go on an adventure to find Virgu The Beast.

name: Elf Wives Cheat to Ride my Meat
description: This visual novel proves working at the adventurer's guild isn't so bad when you can give the sexiest members a quest to fuck you instead of fighting monsters in a dungeon.

name: Optimal Conditions for a Sacrifice
description: It’s very straightforward and approximately 5k words short and has slightly different offering outcomes but they all lead to the same one ending; couple of dead-ends are present in case you mess up.

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Chicken Edition: Splat Jaypak's Arenas
description: Join the party as they are trapped and captured by the sadistic owner of the Wheel of Misfortune, Splat Jaypak. If they want to get out, they will have to shape up and fight through every ordeal their captor can throw at them. Are you ready for battle?

name: Burger Chef Tycoon: Complete Edition
description: Like going out to town for a snack? Everybody does! But perhaps you'd like to see that from the other side? Not everyone can, so don't waste the opportunity! Manage the preparation of burgers, fries, crispy chicken and a multitude of other treats!

name: Lost: Find
description: This is a turn-based casual game. Players can attack or restore blood volume according to the value of the sieve, and pass the level by defeating the boss.

name: The Way Home: Dungeon Cat
description:
Trapped on a strange island, Kevin and Cheese struggle to return home.
There are also terrifying monsters and other lost people on the island.

name: Auction
description: Auction is a 4 player co-op horror game where you must escape a mysterious building by finding keys left around. Solve puzzles, find keys and avoid the guards to reach the exit gate and break out...

name: Break Free
description: Break Free is a fast paced third person sci fi shooter game. The creatures that live among us have made the Earth uninhabitable for human life. You are mankind's best hope for survival. Make no mistake, war is coming and you shall die today, then you shall live to fight again tomorrow.

name: Modest Eyes
description: Modest Eyes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Elisa Dragon Hunter
description: Elisa Dragon Hunter is an emotional action adventure in a dark fantasy setting. You play as a brave dragon hunter - Eliza. Your goal is to make your way through the cursed, evil-inhabited lands to find the last dragon and face him in an epic battle.

name: Underwater World
description: Underwater World - is a colourful 2D platformer with dynamic and hardcore gameplay where you will have to do different levels playing as Plankton.

name: Pretty Girls Rivers
description: Compete with Pretty Girls in the puzzle game "Rivers"!Find and eliminate the paired tiles within the time limit.You can get various costumes of beautiful girls by clearing each stage.Aim, complete the costume!

name: Mirror Party
description: Come out and party with bishojos from the Mirror series in a world of fun mini-games featuring online mode. There’s also a Gacha Machine where you can easily get OVER 300 pieces of collectibles (1000+ when upon formal release): CGs/Cosplay Album/Video/OST and more!

name: Maze Art: Rainbow
description: Maze Art: Rainbow - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Yui Tui
description: Yui Tui is a 2D Platform Action game where Yako, the protector of the island, has been assigned to eliminate the enemies who infiltrated the island with an intention of ruling over it.

name: Paper Bride
description: Paper Bride is a Chinese horror mystery puzzle game. You will play as the groom to search for the truth and have bizarre encounters, gradually learning about the dark mystic custom in the bride's home village and a story from the past...

name: Parametric Creature: Lab
description: Explore and create parametric creatures

name: Sushi Run
description: SushiRun is a runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Salmon Sushi.

name: Sleepin' Guy: Deluxe Edition
description: Sleepin' Guy Deluxe Edition is a first person action-puzzle game set in physics based worlds. This new enhanced edition includes lots of improvements plus extra contents.

name: Hell Let Loose: Spearhead Edition
description: Join the ever-expanding experience of Hell Let Loose - a hardcore World War Two first person shooter with epic battles of 100 players with infantry, tanks, artillery, a dynamically shifting front line and a unique resource based RTS-inspired meta-game.

name: Nekograms
description: Help cats get to sleep in this adorable puzzle game! Move the cats and cushions so that every kitty is nice and comfy. But there’s a twist! Cats only move left and right, and cushions only move up and down.

name: Construction Site Driver
description: You may know about driving, but that doesn't mean you're ready for what awaits you at the site. Begin your adventure today and discover the unique joys of being a construction worker! Take control of one of ten distinct and varied vehicles that share one characteristic - every one of them is essential in completing the building. Drive a cement mixer, a drilling truck, a fork lift, an excavator and more! Feel the immense power of those impressive vehicles and use them to the best of your ability!

name: Titan Quest: Eternal Embers
description: Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

name: Christmas Horror
description:
Merry Christmas!

Santa Claus is ready to take over your soul and gain a few more years of life. He only needs two days to get all the resources he needs for the ritual, so this is your time to escape!

You can escape on your own or finish off Santa, it's up to you, but we don't know how to finish him off yet... Just make sure he don't catch you or he will just make your life difficult.

Technical details:
Christmas Horror is a short horror FPS (first-person-shooter) game where you must find a way to escape Santa's house using the scattered items around. You have two ways of escaping and even a way to finish santa forever! As a child, you have severe limitations such as carryng only 1 item per time and of course, being slowly than Santa. The game has no save system, so you just have one chance to escape.

Good Luck and remember, be a nice child and maybe he forgives you.

name: Gloom Reducer
description: A wandering game with two endings.

name: Carrot
description: 20 minutes long. Point and click your way through a short story which involves a magnifying glass, strawberries, flowers, unicorns and a carrot.

name: Loosepo
description: This is an ultra-lightweight Top-Down shooting game with roguelike elements. You need to constantly recycle your empty wine bottles to replenish ammunition. Use the initial props cards and the upgrade cards in the game to build a powerful butt baby, and then help it defeat the evil rotten demons

name: No Crooks on Christmas
description: No Crooks on Christmas is a tower defense game with a fun holiday theme. Defend your house against a relentless onslaught of crooks and save Christmas!

name: Gardenia
description:
Gardenia is a FPP gardening simulator with elements of platformer, crafting, adventure, exploration and more!

A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: Circus Pocus
description: Welcome to the circus of violence!

name: The Divine Deception
description: The Divine Deception awaits you in Panthea. Will you be able to find the truth? Deduce, brainstorm, fight, and hack your ways through obstacles. But remember: Panthea's story is a game to be bet on. Nothing more.

name: Araignees
description: Atmospheric First-Person Horror Adventure. Follow the feverish dream of an industrial worker plunged into a nightmare after a small spider bite...

name: Wolfpack Island
description: Explore an island, meet others wolves in a multiplayer world, mine for resources, plant and harvest crops and take part in a wide-range of mini-games and activities! Dazzle friends with rare clothes and complete quests to find rare items!

name: Momotype
description:
The monotype, an off-shoot virtual pet, is being play-tested by members of your company. You have been selected.

An experimental, retro take on tamogotchi-lite games. Will you fulfill Momo's needs or does he need something greater?

name: Mason and Strings
description: Mason needs Strings' help to learn how to play guitar so she can perform at the Castle Concert. Travel around Hub City to collect music sheets, solve puzzles, and interact with the many inhabitants! With Strings, you can grapple between platforms and play different chords using the Chord Wheel! Enjoy exploring a lively world and becoming a master musician!

name: Loch Ness
description: Loch Ness is a 1-4 Player Co-Op Horror Hunter. You and your team must navigate precarious waters, use your equipment to hunt for Nessie’s feeding ground and lay bait to lure her out. But be careful, for lurking deep beneath the lake is a creature more ancient than all mankind…

name: Getting It Up
description: An open world action / comedy variety game with a unique blend of 2D and 3D game modes. With Multi-player PvE, open world racing, combat based 2D platforming and tons of quirky humor.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy - Vol. 3
description: This is a single-player battle action game that challenges you with appealing characters and original story missions while maintaining the same control feel of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2! This product is Vol. 3 (Episodes 11-15) of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation Code Fairy.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles X Justice League Turbo
description: TMNTXJL is a fan made fighting game that runs on the I.K.E.M.E.N. Go Engine. The team referred to as "News Team 6" were also responsible for TMNTXJL on the M.U.G.E.N. Engine.

name: A Visit to Friends
description: A Visit to Friends is a collection of four dioramas, each with their own themes, characters, and puzzles to solve. Catch chickens, put in a day's work, and explore your own subconscious through heterodox methods. All this and more is in store when you take A Visit to Friends.

name: Underground Life
description: Underground Life is an open world game where the main objective is to survive in a post-apocalyptic world gather resources, create weapons and armour and interact with all kinds of characters.

name: Chorus: Day One Edition
description:
Take control of Nara, once the Circle's deadliest warrior, now their most wanted fugitive, on a quest to destroy the dark cult that created her. Unlock devastating weapons and mind-bending abilities in Chorus, a true evolution of the space-combat shooter. Along with Forsaken, her sentient starfighter, explore ancient temples, engage in exhilarating zero-g combat, and venture beyond our waking reality.

Chorus: Day One Edition includes a copy of the base game and the Elder Armor Skin Set. Resplendent in gold and purple livery, reserved only for the most exalted members of the Circle, the Elder Armor harks back to Nara's military past. This cosmetic pack can be applied to Forsaken as well as all three of the starting weapons; the Gatling Gun, Missile Launcher and Laser Cannon.

name: Disney Magical World 2: Enchanted Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a world of magic in Disney Magical World 2: Enchanted Edition! Make a new home in this enchanted Disney world and hang out with beloved Disney characters! Explore Disney-themed worlds full of fun challenges and live your dream life as you go on fun adventures, dance with Disney Princesses, soar with Mickey in Magical Dream parades, and more! Get ready for hours of enchanted fun as you build your own Disney Magical World!

name: Yuoni: Sunset Edition
description: Yuoni is a first-person narrative horror game that whisks you away to a sunset-stained world to play a deadly game of hide and seek. As grade-schooler Ai, navigate authentic Japanese environments and utilise every hiding space you can find to survive the horrors ahead. And if they find you… run.

name: Udongein X
description: Help Reisen Udongein Inaba navigate through 14 action packed stages in this exhilarating 2D Bullet Hell Platformer based on Touhou Project!

name: Big Brain Academy: Brain vs. Brain
description:
Battle to see who has the brawniest brain

Take on a series of brain-bending activities that test your mental mettle in Big Brain Academy: Brain vs. Brain for the Nintendo Switch system! Play a wide variety of activities, like memorizing a series of numbers, identifying an animal as it slowly comes into focus, or helping guide a train to its goal in fun, fast activities. Go brain-to-brain with friends and family in 4-player* matches to see who gets the highest score. Everyone can play together at varying difficulties, so a kid can hold their own against an adult in this battle of the brains!

Treat your brain to some quick mental fun

Get your own Big Brain Brawn score with a fun test. Boost your skill and speed by practicing certain activities. Of course, you can also prep for your next multiplayer brain battle or compare scores with friends and family. Unlock dozens of outfit options for your in-game avatar—from a cat outfit to a corn costume!

Go brain vs. brain against mind-masters near and far

Want to see how you match up to brainiacs around the world? Hop into Ghost Clash mode to compete against other users’ data**. Choose from mental marvels worldwide, folks on your friend's list, or family members who have profiles on the same system. Outside of Ghost Clash mode, check your rankings to see how your Big Brain Brawn matches up against others.

name: Cotton Rock 'n' Roll: 30th Anniversary - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Cotton Rock 'n' Roll,
- Nata de Cotton Nendoroid,
- Cotton Complete Works book,
- Cotton Rock ‘n’ Roll original soundtrack CD

name: Danganronpa: Decadence - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Seagull
description: A young woman grows up on the shores of a lake and loves it as the gulls do, and is as happy and free as they are. But a man happens to come that way and destroys her, just because he can.

name: Ephesus
description: Ephesus is an exploration and survival game adorned with a unique story. Write your own destiny through the West Aegean Coast of the glorious Roman Empire. While you're on the path, don't forget to stay alive!

name: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony - Anniversary Edition
description: A new chapter begins! Danganronpa V3 is coming to Nintendo Switch for the first time! Danganronpa 10th Anniversary Release: Part 3! This 10th Anniversary edition comes with a gallery feature that allows you to view event illustrations, scenes, and listen to voiced dialogue!

name: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc - Anniversary Edition
description: Danganronpa arrives on Nintendo Switch to celebrate its 10th anniversary! Danganronpa 10th Anniversary Release: Part 1! This Anniversary edition comes with a gallery feature that allows you to view event illustrations, scenes, and listen to voiced dialogue!

name: Danganronpa S: Ultimate Summer Camp
description:
Your favorite Danganronpa characters return for a hope-filled Summer!
With an all-star dream lineup of characters from each Danganronpa game, gather Hope Fragments at a tropical resort. Explore Jabberwock Island and develop your Dangan characters. Gather money through battle and upgrade your equipment, then defeat bosses and move on to the next island!

name: Crazy! Laundry Game: Don't Hit Mom With Dangerous
description:
Throw ridiculous things into the washer!
A crazy laundry game that makes you relax!

name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm
description: Your dream is about to become a reality as you just landed a brand new job at the latest iteration of the Happy's Humble fast food franchises, Happy's Humble Burger Farm.

name: Heroland: Knowble Edition
description: The Heroland theme park offers guests an authentic RPG-style adventure for a price, but when a scruffy young park guide and his guests uncover ulterior motives by the organizers, legends become reality, and guests must take the fate of the park (and the world!) into their own hands. Created by an all-star development team consisting of key people behind MOTHER 3, Legend of Mana, and Fantasy Life, this 2D adventure brings not only a host of quirky heroes and their unique abilities to join your party for a new take on classic RPG-style combat but also a colorful cast of monsters employed by the theme park, many with their own stories to tell!

name: Chorus
description: Take control of Nara, once the Circle's deadliest warrior, now their most wanted fugitive, on a quest to destroy the dark cult that created her. Unlock devastating weapons and mind-bending abilities in Chorus, a true evolution of the space-combat shooter. Along with Forsaken, her sentient starfighter, explore ancient temples, engage in exhilarating zero-g combat, and venture beyond our waking reality.

name: Heim
description:
Heim is an indie puzzle adventure game inspired by Norse mythology. An unexpected visitor turns Ashyr's homelife upside down, bringing him into a mystical adventure that takes him to far-off places and different worlds. Use your wits and acquire magical abilities to regain your home!

Travel from world to world to discover ancient magicks sealed within runes: harnessing runic magic grants Ashyr various abilities, from seeing the memories of the past unfold before his very eyes, to moving objects without even touching them. Ashyr wields no weapons or armour, but overcomes obstacles with his magic flute. His adventure sees Ashyr sail the endless seas, discover the secrets of a shattered world, delve in the misty realm of the dead, and seek out the gods themselves.

Discover secrets, collect lore scrolls and arcane remnants, and solve varied, unique puzzles in the divine realms of Heim!

name: The Captain
description: Race back home across the galaxy. Collect new friends. Make new enemies. You won't be able to save everyone. Who will you leave behind? Which civilizations will you save - or destroy - along the way? The decisions are up to you.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Post-Dusk Odyssey
description:
Version 5.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Sweet 'n' Spicy
• New Story Chapter XXVII: Dusk of the Fool
• A Post Honkai Odyssey Chapter 2 Prologue: Before Starfall
• ...and more!

name: The Ascent: CyberSec Pack
description: The CyberSec Pack is the new explosive collection from CyberSec Mega. With 2 new weapons, 1 new tactical, 4 new pieces of armor and 4 new animated weapon skins, you will have all you need to make a bang!

name: Mail Mole + Expansions Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Rubber Bandits: Supporter Pack
description:
The Supporter Pack is a collection of characters made from almost pure gold and an extremely rare unicorn.
Buying this is a way for you to show your support for the game and the devs.
- 4 golden characters exclusive to the supporter pack. This is your way of showing what a generous person you are.
- 1 Unicorn.

name: Chess is Stupid!
description: Shoot the Juicers.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Batman Expansion
description: Batman fans - one and all - cannot miss this expansion dedicated to the Dark Knight, which puts you among the criminals and heroes of Gotham City. These themed vehicles and new track environment are worthy of the battle between good and evil!

name: Itsutsu no Neito+
description: A free single-player RPG that you can enjoy from start to finish! A hearty story with an in -depth battle system!

name: How did I get here?
description: You awake from a dream unable to remember where you are or how you got there. Far stranger is that you begin to be transported to different times and places unbidden. It seems that you are “stuck in a time-loop, cursed to hop through time for eternity,” unless you can figure out a way to master time travel and solve the mystery of why this is happening to you and how to break free of it.

name: Bug Star
description: "Bug Star" is a game based on bugs, which means you need to find the bugs that the developer intentionally added to the game & you need to use them to complete the levels.

name: NSFW Studio
description: NSFW Studio is a casual arcade idle clicker game where your job is not only about editing porn videos, but also fucking your freelancers at your work desk. Your side chicks might not like what you do, so keep an eye out and don’t get caught!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Blood Angels Elites
description: Two new elite units join the Blood Angels in their fight for the liberation of Baal Secundus: the Assault Terminators and the Sanguinary Guard.

name: Poly Memory: Cats
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with cats.

name: Ice Station Z
description: Thirdperson Open World Zombie Survival.

name: Postknight 2
description: Adventure through treacherous trails and deliver to vivid characters with their own passions and struggles. Develop special bonds and create lasting memories with the sweethearts of Prism. Become a part of this fantasy world as you quest and make the tiniest of differences to the people you meet and the places you travel to.

name: Prototype Blocks 2
description: Prototype Blocks 2 - Continuation of the first part of the puzzle in which new difficulties and portals await you!

name: Crazy Athletics: Summer Sports and Games
description: On your marks, get set, go!

name: Maze Art: Green
description: Maze Art: Green - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Black
description: Maze Art: Black - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Blue
description: Maze Art: Blue - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Maze Art: Brown
description: Maze Art: Brown - is a minimalist game of simple mazes with relaxing music.

name: Ultimate Tag
description: Gather your friends (or your enemies) and play Ultimate T.A.G. - A light-hearted, fun, callback to the game of everyone's childhood! With multiple game modes such as Classic, Infection, and Freeze Tag, endless hours of fun are guaranteed!

name: Dead Transmission
description: Play an experimental asymmetric co-op multiplayer with your friend! Have one person move through a FPS horror level while the other be the eye in the sky. Can you and your friend communicate well enough to make it through all the difficulty levels?

name: Cubstacle
description: Cubstacle is a casual puzzle and maze game. Within it your objective is to free cubes trapped in dangerous and confusing rooms, the movement of the cubes is limited and cannot be canceled stopping only when encountering an obstacle or death.

name: Marrakech
description: There is a doctor possessed by demons inside Marrakech hospital, he is invoking evil creatures. Pacientes inside need your help. Use a blessed Ak and defeat the creatures that comes your way.

name: Babyquick: Adventure of the Moon Dragon
description: Once upon a time, there was a terrible force of evil called "The Fud King." The Fud King fed on the fear, uncertainty and doubt of his people. This story begins shortly before his fall.

name: Pako 3
description: Original car chase game is back! Pako 3 brings insane amount of levels and cars to unlock, while keeping the simple gameplay. Transport your crew as a getaway driver, escape cops in survival levels and drive fast laps on racing levels!

name: Wonderputt Forever
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Windmills, schwindmills! In this mini-golf game, bizarre and beautifully constructed courses shift and evolve before your eyes.

Wonderputt Forever brings a pocketable nostalgia trip to places you've never been before. A mini-golf game where you must plan your shots carefully and sink the ball into each unique hole. With each completed level, the courses come to life, shifting and changing to prepare for the next. Play in Par Mode, then keep the fun going through hundreds of geometric-themed holes as you unlock rewards in the Geometry Trips mode.

name: Way Down
description: Live this action-packed spy adventure based on the movie The Vault.

name: Jigsaw Fun: Wonderful Nature
description: Solve 100 jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature. Puzzle solo or together in multiplayer for up to 4 players!

name: Football Battle
description: Enter a match, defeat your opponent and claim your trophies! Climb the divisions, collect powerups and dominate the field.

name: Contact
description: Contact is a horror point and click adventure game. In a bizarre world where you are trapped in an accident, you must investigate and find the whereabouts of your family. You have to run away from the creatures that attack you and collect items to overcome obstacles.

name: Zookeeper: Blast Quest
description:
Experience an exciting and exhilarating new kind of matching puzzle!

The latest series of the famous action-puzzle game "Zookeeper," played by more than 30 millions of people around the world, is now in VR!

Play a brand-new feel Puzzle; Destroy matching color blocks using Shooter, more colors means more boosters and more explosion!

Do well in the puzzle to collect stars, clear missions in the zoo; feeding animals, help visitors find their lost child, fish for food, and many more!

name: Beastie Bay DX
description: Washed ashore a desolate island and surrounded by savage beasts, can you thrive...or merely survive? Blaze trails into unknown territory...and then make it your own! Plant crops, build housing and power sources, and transform the island into your own personal paradise. As you progress, you'll be able to develop new gear and technology to take your adventure to the next level, including ways to travel to unexplored islands nearby! The native fauna eyeing you as their next meal? Capture the critters, trade them with friends, and train them to fight for you! Most have elemental strengths and weaknesses, so use these to your advantage in battle. Venture far enough afield and you may find signs of civilization. If you make the right friends, your humble isle could grow into an economic powerhouse, complete with hot springs, hotels, and heliport. The possibilities are as limitless as the horizon! Survival of the fittest was never so fun! You call the shots as you develop your primitive isle into a luxurious slice of paradise! Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games!!

name: Arcade Archives: Liquid Kids
description: Liquid Kids is an action game released by Taito in 1990. Take control of the young hero from the hippo tribe, Hipopo, and battle against the Fire Demon to protect the peaceful Woody-Lake. An adventure of danger and excitement is just beginning.

name: The Sims 4: Modern Menswear Kit
description: Revolutionize the classics with The Sims 4: Modern Menswear Kit, featuring a thought-provoking, accessible collection designed by Stefan Cooke. Reimagined shapes redefine traditionally masculine fashions, while textiles and patterns elevate each unique piece for today's style.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 5
description: Grab a grog and don your best party finery – Sea of Thieves Season Five’s boatload of Voyage-enhancing features arrives December 2nd! Bury loot for safety or share your treasure maps with curious crews, employ fresh strategies and schemes with the Cannon Rowboat or simply celebrate another year of free content updates by pulling up a pew to ‘ooh’ and ‘ahh’ at a flashy fireworks display. No matter what style of scoundrel you play, there’s sure to be something for you to enjoy!

name: Examination Chambers
description: In this short puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles. Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.

name: Intruder on the Bridge
description: Intruder on the bridge tells the story of Captain Dyce, a skilled galactic union officer in command of the Ventura, the largest spaceship ever built. Dyce will have to investigate the death of his brother, killed by a mysterious plot that seems to come from the highest ranks of the union.

name: Virtual Hunter
description: Prepare for a hunting experience of a lifetime. Virtual Hunter brings realistic hunting to virtual reality. Pack your gear and put your hunting skills and tactics to the test in the open wilderness.

name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Aoi Tsukiyo no Mahou no Ko - Game de Asobou! Eiga no Sekai
description:
Let's get excited with the 20 kinds of party mini-games base on movie episodes with family and friends!

This game is comical and strange base on movie episodes that contain 20 types of mini-games. All mini-games are compatible with a single Joy-Con and can play up to four players competitively or cooperatively.

Collect jigsaw puzzle pieces to complete the scene from the movie.

By playing the mini-games, you will receive puzzle pieces as a reward and can be placed into the jigsaw puzzle. When one jigsaw puzzle is complete, a scene from the movie will show.

Furthermore, you can repeat the completed jigsaw puzzle as many times as you like. The time it takes to complete is recorded, so you can break the record in the shortest time as you can.

New characters from the movie will appear.

Not only the familiar characters will appear, but also the new mages from the movie will appear in the game.

name: Across the Galaxy: Stellar Dominator
description: In the game, You can assist your friends in occupying resource-rich strongholds, attack other camps,prevent friendly strongholds from being invaded,assist your friendly camps in developing technology. At the same time, continue to strengthen your own technology by developing more powerful spaceships

name: My Universe: Doctors and Nurses
description:
Step into the shoes of a doctor or a nurse! Diagnose illnesses and infections so you can treat and help your many patients. Set out on an adventure in a buzzing hospital environment, meet all sorts of characters and discover a story full of surprises!

Play as two new hospital recruits! Gradually realize that your day-to-day existence is going to be anything but restful. Build relationships with the other members of your team and get to know their personalities. Over the course of your next adventure, you’ll take care of various patients, listen to them carefully to understand their symptoms and play fun mini-games to treat them. Every day is a new challenge with its fair share of surprises including a rival colleague called Doctor Pierce! Try not to let him distract you from your patient’s care!

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! - Limited Edition
description:
Romans, pirates and boars beware! The famous Gauls Asterix and Obelix are coming back for a brand new adventure!

Unlike the magic potion, the gameplay recipe is pretty straight forward and holds no secrets. Think about the core mechanics defining the beat’em up genre and sprinkle with some local co-op! By Jupiter, by Teutates.. These Gauls are crazy!

The Limited Edition includes:
- Asterix & Obelix: Slap them All! with limited edition box
- A keychain
- Two sitckers sheets
- A content to be revealed soon

name: Highrise Mogul
description: Highrise Mogul: design, build and manage your own skyscraper. Make floor plans, place rentable rooms, hire staff, design a beautiful garden, manage your own power grid and much more!

name: Leenie Boog
description: The war. Light versus darkness. It has been going on for thousands of years. One night, the Thousand-Year War suddenly knocked on your window. You will have to meet an uninvited guest.

name: Abi and the soul
description: Abi is a girl who wakes up lost and without memory on a magical island, but finds a small celestial light that will accompany her in this wonderful adventure of love and friendship. She discovers the mystery of the island and recovers all your memories.

name: Faerie's Bargain: The Price of Business
description: Become the greatest of the goblin merchants in this gaslamp faery-tale! Buy and sell secrets and memories! Trade in time, shadows, and stranger things!

name: Mechajammer
description: A tactical cyberpunk turn-based RPG set on an off-world grindhouse jungle colony. Skulk through the shadows or charge in guns blazing. Recruit a unique party for large squad-based assaults as your adventure plunges you deep into the city’s secrets.

name: Archvale
description: Take up your weapon in this RPG bullet-hell world and embark on a journey to right wrongs from long ago. Only you can defeat the evil forces of the Undying guardians and reunite the world with the fabled Archvale.

name: Biolum
description: With voices of actresses Charlotte Rampling and Dominique Tipper, Biolum is a VR sci-fi experience which immerses you in the mysterious beauty of deep sea life, on a dive that takes a shocking turn for the worse.

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All!
description:
Romans, pirates and boars beware! The famous Gauls Asterix and Obelix are coming back for a brand new adventure!

Unlike the magic potion, the gameplay recipe is pretty straight forward and holds no secrets. Think about the core mechanics defining the beat’em up genre and sprinkle with some local co-op! By Jupiter, by Teutates.. These Gauls are crazy!

name: Century: Age of Ashes
description: Century: Age of Ashes is a free-to-play multiplayer dragon battle game. Master a growing roster of classes and dragons, compete in intense arena battles and rule the skies in fast-paced aerial combats.

name: Rubber Bandits
description: Not every heist goes as planned in Rubber Bandits - a physics-based multiplayer brawler for 1-4 players.

name: Castle on the Coast
description: A hand-drawn, retro 3D collectathon. Parkour through a magic castle as George the Giraffe! String together sweet moves to explore crystal caverns, stone laden halls, and trippy alternate dimensions.

name: Fights in Tight Spaces
description:
Fights in Tight Spaces blends deck-building, turn-based tactics, and thrilling animated fight sequences in classic action-movie settings. Learn to balance your hand, momentum, and positioning to overcome the odds to defeat your adversaries.

Pick from over 150 cards as you build a deck to suit your play style and your opponents’. Encounter random events, acquire enhancements (or injuries), and make critical choices about how best to upgrade your agent for the fights ahead.

name: DelayedSun
description: Melvin's long journey through the CroakForest to find his partner and get out of the area that has been filled by zombies.

name: Solar Ash
description: Journey through a surreal, vivid and highly stylized world filled with mystery, wild high-speed traversal, endearing characters, and massive enemy encounters. The Void beckons…

name: Metal Dragon
description: The President's daughter has been kidnapped, and Metal Dragon is the only one who can save her in this 16-bit run and gun action game. The powers that be want this to be a stealthy mission, but Metal Dragon has other ideas… and easy access to lots of guns.

name: Ace of Gifts
description:
Ace of Gifts is a visual novel about a date between girlfriends. Visit the various stalls at the city's annual holiday market, browse the products and balk at the prices. In between stalls, the couple discuss their relationship, as well as the obligations and expectations of family over the holidays.

It's a cold December afternoon, and Sophie has just received an out-of-nowhere text from her girlfriend, Annette, inviting her to the seasonal holiday market. Sophie's elated to attend, but can't help but be a bit worried. Usually, these sort of dates mean that Annette has something on her mind...

name: Date with Detective Wolf
description:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choosing your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One decision can change everything!

name: Home
description: In "Home" you experience the story of Li and Halo, who both return home after a long time. It's about feeling disconnected and untrue to yourself. "Home" is an honest short game about trans kids and the roll they have to play for family members.

name: Angels
description:
In 48K mode, you get full gameplay with one additional loading after the third level.
In 128K mode, the game uses many additional features: additional types of enemies, a variety of punches, cutscenes, effects, in-game AY music, advanced intro and final cut and more. The game has 1 Player and 2 Players modes. Default keys: QAOP + Space + H to change character. You can define keys in the main menu. With every punch you accumulate energy. You can use super strike when the energy is maximum. To do this, hold the fire key, but before you need to move away from the enemy.

name: Bingo Wackadoo Watch
description: Let’s play with Bluey, Bingo and the Wackadoo Watch! Cute wristwatch featuring Bingo includes eight digital clock faces, time tools and four games. Bluey and Bingo will guide you through games that include characters from the show. Bandit has wound Bingo up like a wind-up toy! Press the left and right buttons to help Bingo avoid obstacles that appear in the classroom. Bluey wants to play a game of keepy-uppy! At Hammerbarn, Bluey wants to buy the same thing as Bingo, or help Bluey keep a balloon off the ground by using the left and right buttons! Time tools include a stopwatch, timer and alarm. Wackadoo!

name: Bluey Wackadoo Watch
description: Let’s play with Bluey, Bingo and the Wackadoo Watch! This wristwatch for kids featuring Bluey includes eight digital clock faces, time tools and four games. Hear the voices of Bluey and Bingo guide you through games that include characters from the show.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Tranquil Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Serene Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Scenic Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Radiant Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams: Idyllic Pack
description: Expand your puzzle collection and increase your room decoration possibilities!

name: Mario '85
description: It's Christmas of 1985, and Lucas has just received a gift from his Uncle Mark, an NES with a brand new copy of Super Mario Bros! Lucas, not having much to do, begins to play the very next day...

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Heritage
description: The fifth implementation of seasons intersected with the Winter season in Northern Hemisphere and Summer season in the Southern Hemisphere. A theme of this season is the past with various events tied around Pokémon history.

name: Tetote x Connect
description: Tetote x Connect is an arcade rhythm game released by Taito. The game features a touch-screen interface, where players tap on the screen and follow the movements of their partner to dance to the rhythm! Players can customize their partners in a variety of accessories, and also play to numerous songs from anime, artists, and labels such as Sega, Vocaloid, anime openings, and many more!

name: Dominoes Café
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Settle in for a relaxing game of dominoes with a variety of realistic challenges in one-on-one or two-on-two contests.

name: Black Mesa: Blue Shift
description: Initially developed and released by Gearbox Software in 2001, second Half-Life add-on, Half-Life: Blue Shift is a return to the Black Mesa Research Facility and another look at the Incident's consequences from the eyes of Gordon Freeman's best friend - Barney Calhoun. In 2012, Crowbar Collective has delighted Half-Life fans with release of the magnificent Half-Life remake, but there are still no released remakes for add-ons. This is when they are coming in - HECU Collective are developing the Black Mesa: Blue Shift - a free remake with use of Black Mesa resources and style.

name: Dragon Quest Keshi Keshi
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - Mexico Civilization
description: This content brings the Mexicans as a playable civilization to Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition for the very first time.

name: CoWorker
description: Local co-op tower defense game set in a factory with zombies.

name: They Сame From Above
description: They Came From Above is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of aliens.

name: Chess Crown
description: Chess Crown chess in a medieval fantasy theme and with the opportunity to compete with other players on the network.

name: Lab Bio-Terror
description: Lab Bio-Terror - In this shoot em all game, you are a special agent who was sent to clean up a secret laboratory. Scientists screwed up, and it's up to you to eliminate the consequences of the leak of a dangerous virus!

name: Fallen London: The Poisoner's Library
description:
An addon for Fallen London. The Premium Story for December, 2021.

Can be started from your Jericho Library in the Jericho Locks using the "Our Lady of the Canals" storylet, or from the Fate page. This story is high level content.

name: Fallen London: The House of Silk and Flame
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for December, 2021.

name: Don't Bug Me!
description: A puzzle game about annoying people made for Github Game Off 2021. Fill up the Bugged-o-meter and search for collectable bugs!

name: Guacuco
description: Guacuco is an experimental interactive diorama about confronting traumatic memories and letting them go. You're stuck in your nightmares, and the only way out is to face your pain, gather all your memories, and return them to the flow of time.

name: Angels Prayer
description: Angels Prayer is a horror filled with dark personalities and terrible demons who constantly strive to catch you. Explore all the rooms and return the shrines of heaven. Remember, in this place only prayers light your halo and old greasy candles. Avoid the demons and complete the ultimate mission.

name: Race for Your Life
description: Race for your life - In this racing game you try to pass on the license from a radical car inspector. Any mistake you make can be the last in your life .. Literally!

name: Mega City Void
description: You play the role of a black hole that has penetrated our world. Your task is to absorb as many houses, trees, cars and other objects as possible.

name: Zombie Craft
description: Try your hand at exciting survival and prove that you are not afraid of any challenges! Defeat all the evil dead and free the virtual world from danger. You need to confront these monsters by any means. Be the bravest!

name: Microwasp Seekers
description: Pilot a BeeBot and keep the Seeker Mothership happy by defragmenting a constantly filling hard drive to chill synthwave beats!

name: Fruit Basket
description: Fruit Basket is an arcade game that makes your brain work to the maximum. Jump over the fruits, getting further and further to the basket. Pepper flying on its axis can send you to the beginning. Cactus is also dangerous. The game is not for the "weak".

name: Adamanta View
description: An action Surviving game with a mission!

name: SnowTunes Island
description: SnowTunes Island is a musical platforming adventure where the soundtrack doubles as your life-bar. As a Snowman, use momentum and ice to cross the island and catch the thief who stole your CD collection!

name: DarkHouse
description: This is not a typical corridor horror, but a game in a semi-open world with horror elements. You will have to perform a reverse ritual in a psychiatric clinic in order to banish the creepy Doctor back to Hell! Not for weaklings!!! Especially in the Nightmare mode, a real hardcore awaits you!

name: Froggerty Arcade 2
description: The hop is on. More classic arcade froggy goodness from Tudou Games.

name: TripSync
description: A machine-learning utilizing application for immersing in a bundle of multi-world diverting storylines of random interesting scenarios in which the characters are vocally interactable.

name: Minesweeper NG
description: Enjoy this variant of the classical puzzle game 'Minesweeper'. You guide a beautiful heroine through a mine field. One wrong step and your character is blasted to smithereens. Your goal is to reach the magic statue that teleports you to the next level.

name: Fantasy Gardens
description: This is a relaxed plant simulation game. The adjustment parameters can simulate the ever-changing plant growth state. Players can design their fantasy gardens with imagination and creativity.

name: Bavity
description: Bavity, A fast paced puzzle game with balls and gravity. Any group of 3 or more balls can be double clicked out of existence. Stop your screen from filling up, Its that simple.

name: Christmas Stories: Yulemen - Collector's Edition
description: A Christmas Calamity Hits Iceland!

name: Sound Voltex: Exceed Gear Konaste
description:
The cloud-based home release of the arcade series beatmania IIDX, released as part of Konami's Konaste line.

The successor to the original home release, Sound Voltex III Gravity Wars: e-amusement cloud, packed full of improvements to the entire experience.

name: Tube Adventures Offline Collection 1-3
description:
Recreation in Unity in offline version of the video games originally created by Víctor Losa Regañón, alias pinofas on YouTube.

This recreation brings together the first 3 installments (Tube Adventures 1-3) and makes them playable offline with controls similar to Youtube, with an interactive timeline in each video. It also contains a system of Merits as Achievements; basically the endings, collectibles and secrets (eg access to Hall of Fame) that could be originally unlocked in each installment. Once each Merit has been obtained, it can be viewed again in its corresponding Merits section from the main menu.

name: Rocket Bot Royale
description: A frantic Battle Royale set on a destructible, sinking Island. Fire rockets from your custom robo-tank to eliminate the competition using advanced tactics and powerful weapons.

name: The Slaverian Trucker
description: The Slaverian Trucker is a Survival/Truck/Life simulator game. Make enough money to survive and expand your wealth in the harsh semi-post apocalyptic lands of Slaveria, doing legal and illegal work, while maintaining, fixing, building, repairing, tuning your trucks, cars and other vehicles.

name: Make the Jump
description: This is a 3D first person hardcore jumping game, where your enemy is time! Try to complete all three levels and get a trophy!

name: Space Survival
description: When a routine mission goes wrong, you are left alone, drifting through space. You must mine ice from asteroids to try to survive as long as you can. This is a roguelike survival game in space, there are power ups, black holes, leaderboard and more!

name: Ball Boys
description: Ball Boys is an online ball-racing championship where you play as a customizable ball and try to score the most points in various parkour challenges. You can roll, double-jump, dash, and maneuver in the air to try and navigate your way through various scenarios.

name: Nymph's Tower
description: An exploration platformer about scaling a tower and discovering its secrets.

name: Big Larry
description: The rainy night starts with a simple favor. Suddenly realizing youre trapped and alone... your fight or flight response kicks in. Especially when the creepy school mascot was just found DEAD. Figure out puzzles, watch your surroundings and most importantly do not disturb BIG LARRY.

name: Diverse Order
description: Sin descripción

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Fangs
description: As you already know, the new season brings many new opportunities to outsmart, trap, and destroy your opponents, but that's not all!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: High Calibre
description:
Rainbow Six Siege introduces the fourth season of Year 6, High Calibre! Our newest Operator, Thorn, joins Rainbow as a Technical Weapons Expert from Ireland's Emergency Response Unit. Never one to back down from a challenge, her strength and leadership set a new course for Rainbow. Her Razorbloom Shell proximity grenade is as sharp as her temper.

This season we've integrated some select updates including Team Colors, a Bulletproof Camera Rework and changes on the Test Server. We're bringing balance to Finka, Drone Counters, Elite 2.0, and more! Read the Patch Notes below for full details.

name: Fooaaahh!
description: You're flying your airplane carrying a huge load of honey, when suddenly your plane explodes! As you fall, avoid birds and airplane parts while trying to hit flying globs of honey to slow down.

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Yuletide Story
description: This is the second game from the Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story. It is a story that happens at Yule and is a story of magic, mystery and evil fairies. A story to get you into the festive spirit.

name: The Wheel of Fortune
description: The only visual novel dating sim with turbo-folk music playing in the background.

name: Winter Dream
description: Caron meets three interesting girls after moving in with his uncle during his winter vacation

name: Propnight
description: Propnight is a 4vs1 multiplayer physics-based prop hunt mixed with classic horror survival. Survivors needs to repair prop machines in order to survive and can change into props to hide from the killer. The killer's objective is to do everything in his power to stop you.

name: Cricket 22
description:
Cricket 22 is the official video game of the 2021–22 Ashes series of cricket matches, and the sequel to the 2019 game Cricket 19.
Cricket 22 delivers the Ashes, the Big Bash, The Hundred, and a multitude of other fan-favourite competitions! All-new mechanics, commentary, and a captivating, narrative driven career mode, will immediately immerse you in the ultimate cricket experience to date.

name: Hexad
description: Hexad is a single and multiplayer competitive turn-based tactical RPG with ARPG-like itemization and crafting and a MOBA-like lobby. Character customization options let you create your own unique style. Solo and PvP competitive game modes. Make your way to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Infinity Treasures
description: Labirinth of Infinity Treasures is a game that can be challenging and funny with each level. Brave forests, swamps, and venture to the depths of the planet to discover forgotten treasures.

name: Bean and Nothingness
description: A difficult tile-based puzzle game about turning beans into monsters -- and monsters back into beans.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Dreams
description: Beautiful Jigsaw Puzzle game where you can design the room you play in!

name: Mazing
description: Mazing is a maze game with different Course Genres

name: Shonen Adventure: The Dual Blades Hero
description: Explore multiple worlds, fight creatures, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more. Start from the bottom and become a hero with the shonen spirit. You can also rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top.

name: Forsaken Portals
description: Explore a huge universe on your journey on behalf of the Stellar Union. Trade with alien races, build your own space stations, collect resources and craft a wide variety of items. Upgrade your ship to defeat even the strongest enemies in the galaxy.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2022
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2022 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: OverShoot Battle Race
description: Inspired in the old-style isometric arcade racing games, OverShoot Battle Race brings back the fight for the first place in an insane journey through one unknown solar system and facing the most amazing racers in the galaxy.

name: True Visions
description: True Visions is a game where you can design houses from top to the bottom as an architect. Start your career as a freelancer, climb up step by step and establish your own company.

name: A Western Drama
description: A Western Drama is an arcade audio game, without any graphics, in which you only use your ears and a pair of headphones to interact with the environment of the game. Follow a dramatic story in the typical spaghetti-western style.

name: Archons of Doom
description: Play as an Archon of Doom to conquer the entire universe in this fantasy horror strategy game.

name: Mud and Blood
description: Mud and Blood, the cult classic flash strategy game is back with a vengeance and this time you are on the offensive. This is a brutal real-time strategy game set in World War 2 where you command a small squad of soldiers against impossible odds in a procedural and unforgiving battlefield.

name: Tag Hop
description: Tag Hop is a fast-paced PvP bunny hop tag game. Hone your movement skills and compete with your friends, or against other real players! Tag Hop has various duel and team-based game modes, which all incorporate tag!

name: Quantum Paradox
description: Quantum Paradox is a single-user story modification for Half-Life 2 Episode 2, which takes place in post-apocalyptic St. Petersburg. There are not so many allies among the survivors, but there are a lot of enemies!

name: Crystal Plague
description: Dynamic and tough action-roguelike in dark fantasy style. Use magic, alchemy and tactical thinking to break through rooms full of traps and monsters. Choose new skills with each level, improve your weapons with each room to break into the depths of the crystal mine and destroy bosses. Again.

name: Journey for the Crown
description: Journey for the Crown is a single player, team-based, story driven, open-world adventure game using multiple characters without the need to pause in combat. This action based combat system brings interesting and new ways to manage your team in a fun way. Journey for the Crown brings a lengthy choose your own adventure dialogue system with over 250 zones to explore, countless hours of quests, adventures and treasures to discover.

name: Exodus H
description: Exodus H is a simulation game in space. You play as the commander of a colonial spaceship. You must build the spaceship in order to survive your inhabitant and navigate into space to find a new planet where Man can live in.

name: Project Space Hunter
description: Project Space Hunter (short PSH) is a free-to-play online multiplayer game from BBN. PSH is currently in the Early Access. Use different unique weapons to experience realistic physics.

name: Mission in Snowdriftland
description: Help Chubby, the fearless little snowman, with saving important artifacts from video game history! Mission in Snowdriftland is a pixel-art homage to classic 2D platformers like Super Mario.

name: Anvil
description: Take on the role of a Vault Breaker in search of alien artifacts called “Vaults” and fight against monsters and powerful bosses, you can strengthen your Breakers to explore the farthest galaxy that no one has ever reached.

name: Divinity Chronicles: Journey to the West
description:
Divinity Chronicles: Journey to the West is a challenging rogue-like deck building game. You will play as one of the heroes, with unique powers modeled as cards, consumables, and relics, to decide the fate of the Realm of Divinity under the omen of darkness.

During your journey, you will encounter various monsters, spirits, celestials, demons, and legendary creatures, with their own stories deeply intertwined yours. Make up your mind to work with them to conserve your strength for later, or to defeat them in an intensive turn based combat.

Beware, you only have one life during the journey. Therefore it is crucial to make careful moves and choices, in order to safely reach your final destination and achieve your missions.

name: For the Night
description: For the Night is a Cold War espionage thriller, taking place during one single night at a seedy hotel in 1970s Stockholm.

name: Something Unlimited
description:
Something Unlimited is a comic-based parody brothel management game. You play as Lex, seeking to concoct a way to rid the world of superheroes while simultaneously placing yourself on one of its thrones. Unfortunately though, plans of world domination tend to cost a lot of money and you’re practically broke. When Roulette comes to you with the idea for a “meta-bordello”, you think up the perfect way to supply her with incredibly enticing workers – as long as you get a fat cut of the profits, of course.

Will you be able to “convince” enough heroines, henchwomen and villainesses to work for you? Can you grow the bordello enough to bankroll your final plan for world supremacy? Will you finally be able to take down the heroes/heroines once and for all, as well as your villainous rivals?​

name: The Shape of Us
description: A VR journey that brings you closer to Nature. You’ll use your whole body on the way – prepare to stretch, crawl, rest, dance, feel!

name: Hunt: Showdown: Death's Herald
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter and two Legendary Weapons:

- Sofia (one hunter)
- Weeping Marigold (one weapon)
- Eye for an Eye (one weapon)

name: Escape Covid Camp
description:
Sent to camp against your will, find a way to escape to freedom. Craft goods to trade with other inhabitants for objects to use in your planned escape. Can you strategize and execute an escape plan through the perimeter of patrolling guards?

Contained within a world of steel, this is not the life you chose. Explore your new home that saps the souls of all who it contains. Fabricate a plan to escape this world force upon you. Freedom is your mission.

name: Decrypt
description:
When a freight ship goes missing and is later found abandoned, you are sent to investigate it to solve the mystery of its missing crew.

The ISS Travan is found at a fringe system thousands of klicks off its original course.

The GiS Trade Federation believes that its crew has abandoned the ship to evade crippling trade fines in a brutal interstellar economy. You are a Data Forensics officer assigned to investigate the vessel.

What you will uncover on the Travan is a far more insidious and horrifying truth.

Features:

First-person sci-fi survival-horror adventure
Story rich gameplay - piece together a compelling narrative to discover the fate of the Travan's crew
Deep Exploration - traverse the ship to locate Terminals to progress
All original soundtrack
Bite-sized thrill - 45 mins - 1 hour playtime!
Intense scares
